1.content:
Choose your sister and method of expansion:

Note that if the girls are gaining weight, they can still get larger breasts, and if their breasts are expanding they can still gain weight. Just try and focus on the type of expansion you choose.

The older sister, Lauren, is an attractive seventeen year old blonde. She's a bit shorter than you at 5'5'' tall, and she likes to be a bit bossy even though she's usually very lazy. Lauren is pretty conventionally attractive, and she's fairly curvaceous all over. Despite her obsessions with health food and dieting, she's a bit chubby, weighing in at 135 pounds with a bit of a paunch on her. This hasn't stopped her from dating a myriad of guys, though.

Your other sister, Megan, is fourteen and wears braces. She has long brown hair and stands around 5'3''. Lauren likes to taunt Megan for her lack of breasts, almost obsessively so. What she misses in the chest department she makes up for in the back, though. She weighs around 120 pounds. You and Megan have always had a better relationship than you and your other sister, Lauren.

11.content:
Flatty.

No-cups.

Ironing board.

Ever since Lauren's ample breasts had started to come in at the ripe age of thirteen, she'd always used Megan's flatness as a source of insults. Meg always thought it would come to an end when she got her boobs. But she hadn't, and it hadn't, and she was beyond fed up with it.

Megan had been planning her revenge for a while. Her parents had just flown off for three months to Europe to jack around, and she felt that now was the perfect time to get even.

And so, Meg bicycled down to the Nutritionist's shop on 35th street.

=======================================

Meg put the bottle of fine white powder in her top dresser drawer under her underwear, where hopefully no one would find it. The label read: Appetite Stimulant - 5000 mg.

If there was one thing Lauren hated, it was being fat. Currently the older girl was a little bit chubby, and she loathed every pound. Lauren would eat nothing but veggies and fruits in front of her family, but ultimately her will was too weak. Every so often Lauren would fall into the trap of sweets, treats, and salty snacks and her progress would be lost. Now that their mother was away, there would be no one to check on Lauren's weight but Lauren herself. And that was just the way Meg wanted it.

The white powder came with a 10 mg spoon, and was designed to treat disorders for which loss of appetite was a side effect. The intention of the product was to take 10 milligrams with each meal, which would give you the will to eat. Clinical strength, apparently. Megan scooped two spoonfuls into a small ziploc baggie. This would be the summer Lauren would get her comeuppance.

She made her way down to the kitchen where Lauren was cooking dinner. Broccoli soup. Disgusting.

You were sitting at the dinner table, playing with your phone.

Meg sat down next to you and scooted her chair over.

"Danger, captain! The hostile aliens are trying to feed us some sort of inedible sludge!" she said into your ear, but loud enough so that it was audible to Lauren.

"Very funny, Flat Stanley. But just because mom's out of town doesn't mean we're all going to turn into human garbage disposals." Lauren said, stirring her soup.

Oh, we won't. thought Meg, But you will.

Megan fingered the ziploc baggie inside her pocket. Soon, the plan would be set in motion.

"Why not, Lauren?" you interjected. "Let's get pizza or something."

"Eat that shit on your own time, dweeb. I took the effort to make this meal, so the least you could do is act grateful."

Lauren poured the servings of broccoli soup into three bowls, looking uncannily like inedible alien sludge. Now was her chance. Meg had to make her move.

"I'll uh- help set the table for you, Lauren!" she said, getting up. Lauren looked surprised.

"Oh, er, thanks, Meg." Lauren turned around to put the pot in the sink. Now or never. Meg tipped the ziploc baggie into Lauren's soup, then stirred it in. The powder quickly became invisible.

Meg put the bowls on the table, making sure to give Lauren her special serving.

The three of you sat down for your first meal without your parents' supervision.

"Bon Appétit!" Lauren said, taking a large bite out of her soup.

=======================================

It was 1:35 in the morning when Lauren woke up in her bed, in great pain. She was in a cold sweat. All her covers had been thrown off. Her stomach growled.

She was more hungry than she'd ever been in her entire life.
11.title: The weight gain revenge plot of Megan McCoy.

111.content:
"Oh, God... Ugh..." Lauren moaned, both hands grasping her stomach as pain shot through her mid-section. Her white tank top stuck to her clammy body, and her eyes were wide open with discomfort. Lauren knew she shouldn't eat in the middle of the night, but right now, she could think of nothing else. "Fuck it." She said quietly, before shakily standing up. The pain in her stomach was just too much. "I'll eat something light and go back to- Ughh!" Mid-sentence, a shooting pain of hunger had run through her body, overriding any idea of modest helpings. Quickly walking to the kitchen, Lauren desperately threw open the refrigerator door, the cold air causing her nipples to harden through her tank top- not that she cared, all Lauren could think about was eating.

Rummaging through the shelves, Lauren began pulling out everything she constantly saw, but almost never ate, due to her diet- Lunch meats, some cooked bacon, cheeses, mayo, butter. Grabbing a freshly opened loaf of bread, Lauren went to work after jamming a handful of ham into her mouth. Slathering one slice of bread with mayo and the other with butter, Lauren loaded the sandwich up with ham, bacon, turkey, and two slices of Monterey Jack cheese. The end result looked almost comical, the sandwich being so thick that Lauren could barely manage to get her mouth around it. However, she could, and she did, taking such a large bite that her mouth bulged with the amount of food inside it. Chewing greedily, Lauren's eyes scanned the kitchen for other foods, which, on any normal day, would have been a ridiculous notion, especially with a large sandwich already in her hands.

Taking another bite of her monstrous creation, Lauren's eyes locked on a clear plastic container: freshly baked cookies from the grocery store, one of the last things her parents had purchased before they left for their trip. Holding the nearly half finished sandwich in one hand, Lauren grabbed the container, noisily opening the lid before clumsily grabbing a cookie and jamming it into her still half full mouth, the sweet taste of the cookie mixing pleasantly with the saltiness of her unhealthy sandwich. As more and more of the sandwich made it's way into her stomach, less and less of the cookies remained in the container, until Lauren had finished both. As Lauren began to feel "normal" again, she took in the disaster area of the kitchen- crumbs and flecks of mayo littered the counter, and now she had an empty tin of cookies to explain to her siblings! Sweeping the mess off the counter with her hand into the empty plastic container, Lauren stealthily opened the door to the garage, chucking the container in the bigger trash can there, in hopes that Megan and Justin wouldn't notice.

Not even questioning the fact that she had just eaten easily 2000 calories in unhealthy foods, Lauren made her way back to bed, one hand happily rubbing her now swollen stomach. As she settled back into bed, a small belch made it's way past her lips, before Lauren blissfully fell asleep, glad that the hunger pains she had experienced had disappeared.

11111.content:
"Ugggh... What the fucking fuck?" Lauren cursed with abandon, struggling to even keep her eyes on the road. The pain from the previous night was back, but... It felt worse than before! "I gotta -hnnngh- eat something, NOW!" Lauren's eyes scanned the signs adorning the side of the road as she slowed her vehicle... Burger place, Chinese place, chicken place... "Ah! This place was -unf- good!" Lauren managed to groan out, forgetting to hit her turn signal as she swerved wildly into the parking lot of the local all-you-can-eat Mexican buffet. Parking rather poorly, Lauren stumbled out of her car, looking to all the world like a drunk.

Lauren's C cup breasts heaved against her tight t-shirt, advertising their local football team, the logo stretched slightly by her endowments. "Just... The one!" She wheezed to the bored looking woman at the podium, who agonizingly slowly lead Lauren to her designated table. Not even bothering to say thank you, Lauren grabbed the plate off the table and hustled her way over to the steam tables to begin loading it up. Two soft shell tortillas were loaded to the absolute brim with meat- one chicken, one beef. Following that, heavy helpings of sour cream, shredded cheese, and every single vegetable on the spread. By the time they were finished, the tortillas were barely visible, although Lauren had no illusions of wrapping them- that would take far too long. Instead, she made her way back to her designated table, at which she began shoveling the various toppings into her mouth using the fork provided to her. She couldn't chew fast enough! Bite after bite of the greasy meats coupled with various toppings were crammed into her mouth, her cheeks bulging outwards with the sheer volume of goods stored within.

By the time the tortillas would have been reasonably roll-able, Lauren had fallen into a rhythm: three or four massive forkfuls of burrito ingredients, followed by rigorous chewing and a quick swallow- during all of which she was herding the various contents on the plate into a single pile, so she could shovel them into her mouth quicker. By the time she had scraped the plate clean (minus the tortillas, now a mushy pile of greasy residue), Lauren could tell she had overdone it. Wiping her hand off on the cloth napkin on the table, she experimentally placed her palm on her slightly pudgy stomach, only to find it made contact much sooner than it should have!

Looking downward, Lauren was shocked to find that her tummy was sticking out enough to actually peek beyond her breasts while she was seated! Letting out a gasp, Lauren snapped her head around, concerned that someone she knew might be present- of course, since it was in the middle of the afternoon, the buffet was basically deserted. "I can't fuckin' believe this... Urrrp!" Lauren muttered.

Lauren prodded her stomach in disbelief until something even worse happened... She realized she was still hungry, although less so. She looked around again, panicked.

This is insane, thought Lauren. I've never eaten this much in my life and I'm still hungry!

She realized what must be done and shuffled over to the buffet. She was more conservative this time, only grabbing three beef hard tacos loaded with sour cream, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

With one last look around to make sure she was in the clear, Lauren threw manners out the window and devoured the tacos in a snarling, violent fashion. She shoved bite after bite down her throat with insane food-lust. It was so un-Lauren that Lauren herself was surprised.

Meanwhile, her stomach grew larger with each bite.

She devoured the last taco, then cleaned up the toppings that had fallen out throughout her pig-out with a fork and her mouth.

Lauren licked her fingers clean of taco grease then lay back in her chair. Now, she felt sated.

Her belly looked as if she'd been knocked up. Her spaghetti strap shirt had ridden up considerably. When she sat, her stomach stuck out about an inch past her breasts, which already stuck out about four inches themselves. Now that she lay back it simply looked as though she'd swallowed a small watermelon.

She rubbed her bulging belly and felt sorry for herself.

If she could just make it to her room, she could lock her door and digest until her stomach (hopefully) shrunk down to a somewhat reasonable size. Meg and Justin are probably just vegging out on their lazy asses, I should be able to sneak through without them noticing!" Lauren whispered to herself, before slowly and quietly easing open the front door.

Creeping through the house, hoping the television was enough to distract her siblings, Lauren was sure she was in the clear until... "Hic-urrrrrrrrp!" A violent hiccup/belch combo made it's way from her lips. Lauren instinctively froze, hoping nobody would say anything, but of course...

"What was that?! Oh, my God, Lauren, you totally pigged out today didn't you?!" Meg's voice crackled with excitement as Lauren attempted to quickly make her way to her room, ignoring her sister. However, in her bloated state, "quickly" meant a slow shuffle, which gave Meg ample time to cut her off, hustling in front of her and placing herself between Lauren and Lauren's room. "Ugh, you fuckin' bitch! Meg, I swear, I'm gonna end you!" Lauren hissed, one hand slowly rubbing her stomach where she had been poked. "Seriously, I'm gonna call Mom and Dad and..." Lauren started, before remembering that would be dumb- what would she say, that she pigged out and Meg noticed?

"And you'll what, tubbo? Heh, tell them you got a tummy ache?" Meg continued to push her luck, noticing how red Lauren's face had become.

"Well, at least I have tits, flatty! Shut your damn mouth and get out of my way!" Lauren attempted to smack Meg on the arm, but only managed to lose her balance and almost fall over. "Hee hee hee! Boy, I wonder who would LOVE to see this picture?" Meg giggled exaggeratedly as she jumped up and down in excitement, taking absolute delight in the power she currently held over Lauren.

"And then what? Again, what would you tell our dear sweet parents? 'Oh, she tripped and fell and got a black eye and smashed her phone!' Yeah, right. Besides, I already" Meg pressed a few buttons, "e-mailed it to myself. I've got a hard copy, now, so it doesn't matter what you do to my phone."

"D'ya want the last piece, Meg?" She looked at you with the iciest of stares. "Oh-kay... sick of cake, then..." you headed towards the garbage with the last slice.

"W-wait..." Megan managed. "I'll take it upstairs for later... don't waste it..."

"Christ. Here you go." You handed the last slice to her, and she carried it upstairs with one hand while holding her bulging belly with the other. Meg went up to her room, the palace of snacks, and lay down to rub her stomach.

When Lauren got back...
131.title: Megan has her cake and eats it too. Justin helps.

choices: "...I never said I wasn't gonna eat them!  My stomach just needs a break."
"Let's find some dirt on Lauren!  Then it's MY turn to make HER pig out."
1311.content:
"What's this?" Lauren snapped. One hand was planted on her hip, the other held a colorful cellophane pack.

"Uh. A bag of Chips Ahoy?" Megan said.

"Right. And what was it doing on the couch?"

"Oh, uh. Because we missed that one, or dropped it or something, I guess."

"I told you. I didn't want to find any of this junk in the house." Lauren tossed the bag contemptuously and Meg grabbed it, nearly fumbling. "So fine. Okay. You want to play human garbage disposal, well, eat up."

"I, uh..." Meg began.

"She's already had plenty today," you protested, earning you a grateful look from Meg. Lauren shakes her head and snorts.

"Apparently not enough."

"She'll get sick if she eats any more!"

"Good, that'll help her learn." Lauren frowned. "And if you make a stink about it, I'll tell Mom what you're spending her money on, and when she gets hole she'll kill both of you."

"It's okay!" Megan says. "I'll eat! I'll eat! See?" She tears off the cover and stuffs a handful of the butter-rich chocolatey pastries into her mouth.

------------

"Feeling okay?" you ask, guiding Meg back up the stairs. "Not gonna hurl?"

"I'm... okay," she breathes. "I'm not gonna barf or anything. I'm just really full."

She's not kidding. After about a pound of cookies on top of everything else, the poor kid is practically waddling.

"You want to lie down again?"

"Yes, but..." She closes her eyes in sudden discomfort. "In your room. Mine's full of a lotta painful reminders right now."

She ends up flopping backwards onto your bed, grunting a little and letting her legs dangle over the edge. "Bleerggh. I'm dead."

"Cause of death?" you ask, mock-seriously.

"Death by cookie," she replies. "Blech. Gross. I feel like I just ate a whole sack of sugar, and not in, like, a good way."

You draw up her hoodie, exposing her bare midriff. "You look like, it, too, Miss Chubby Bunny." You pat her gently rounded stomach.

"H-hey!" she giggles. "Stop it! I'm too full, you're gonna make me barf!"

"Not in my bed!" you say hurriedly. You pull a few tissues from the box on the end table. "Come on, let's get you cleaned up. There's chocolate all over your face."

She turns a little pink.

"All right?"

"Yeah, I'm..." The pink deepens. "It's been a lot time since you cleaned my face off like that."

"Oh. No problem." You push a few stray curly strands from her forehead. "You're still my little sister. Even if you're a little less little in the middle."

She laughs and sticks her tongue out. "Thanks a lot, dummy!"

"So what do you want to do with all those, uh, painful reminders in your room?" you ask.

Meg looks thoughtful. "Hmm..."
1311.title: Cookies or else!

choices: Lauren is out, so the two of you make breakfast!
Lauren is in, and she made whole-grain oatmeal. You two go find something else.
13111.content:
"I never said I wasn't gonna eat them! My stomach just needs a break." Meg insisted, looking up at you with those puppydog eyes of hers.

"Oh Gawd. You ARE a glutton."

"Shut UP, Justin!" she smacked your arm playfully, smiling. Her stomach made a gurgling noise, a concerned expression fell across her face, and she fell back down onto your bed. "Ohhhh... so this is how regret feels..."

You started to rub her belly. Meg tensed up a bit, then closed her eyes and relaxed. "Mmmgh- thanks."

"I'm sorry Meg. This is my fault, I allowed you to buy all those terrible things."

"No, Justin, it's just that Lauren is a brainwashed party pooper that doesn't remember what it's like to be free." the smile returned to Meg's face.

"Pssh, that's for sure. The girl wouldn't know fun if it crawled up her intestinal tract and lodged there."

"Ew." and then, another stomach gurgle. "Ow."

"You're sure you're okay?" you ask, feeling concerned. Sure, your sister liked to eat but this was a bit much.

"Y-yeah, I'm sure. Just let me rest for awhile." you stopped rubbing her belly and got up.

"Do you need anything?"

"Tums."

You walked over and turned off the lights in your room, and went downstairs to get your sister some stomach medication.

============================

When you returned, Megan was already curled up in your bed asleep. You smiled, and set down the meds and glass of water on your bedside table.

You pulled a blanket and pillow out of the linen closet and slept on the floor next to your bed.

The next morning...
13111.title: Don't throw them out!

choices: Megan packs every last particle of space in her stomach and ekes out a win!
Overconfidence is a bitch; stuffed stupid, Meg grinds to a halt and loses.
131111.content:
The next morning, Megan tries a little experiment.

"Jellybeans on pizza?" you say incredulously. "Seriously?"

"Cinnamon jellybeans," she explains, running the cutter through the fresh-from-the-oven breakfast pizza. "They're spicy, so they'll go good with sausage, right? I mean, it's not like they're bubblegum or something. That would be gross. Go ahead, try it!"

You take a nibble. "Still kinda gross. I'm gonna stick with cereal."

"Fine. I'll just have to eat this whooooole pizza by myself," she says mischeiviously.

"I guess your stomach's feeling better, then."

She thumps her stomach. "She's totally rarin' to go."

"Just don't get sick again."

"I won't, geez! I only ate too fast 'cause of stupid Lauren." She rolls her eyes and takes a big bite. "Oh, this is super good!"

You wonder if she's just saying that, but she seems to be enjoying it; over the course of the morning movie ("The Gingerdead Man" on ABC Family, which turns out not to be that good either) she polishes off the entire large pizza and three cans of Mountain Dew.

"I can't believe you ate that whole thing," you comment. She smiles triumphantly and burps. Slouched down in the couch with her feet up on the ottoman, her hoodie has ridden up a few inches, and you can see her belly, bulging with dough and cheese and covered by a thin later of undershirt.

"Seriously, maybe I better back up. That thing looks ready to blow at any moment."

"Oh, ha ha." She pats her stomach. "I could eat way more than that if I wanted to, smart guy."

"You liar, I saw how slow you ate that last piece. Admit it, you're stuffed. You couldn't fit one more burrito in that greedy gullet of yours."

"Could so! I could probably eat, like, six burritos right now."

"You wanna bet?"

"Anytime!" she says hotly.

"Oh--I was joking, Meg, I don't really want to try. You're gonna puke if you try to force down any more food."

"Justin Leonard McCoy, don't you have any faith in your sister?" she snaps. You try not to giggle at her attempt at using your full name; she sounds like a squeaky little version of your mom.

"Fine, okay, it's a bet. But if you lose, um..." You think about it a little. "If you lose...you have to eat a whole pot of Mom's brussels sprout and broccoli soup for dinner."

Meg wrinkles her nose. "Ewww!"

"Uh-huh, and I'll use her stinkiest recipe, too."

"Well... well, who cares, 'cause I'm gonna win, anyway," Meg nods, "and when I do, you have to take me to the beach this afternoon instead of watching these crappy old monster movies."

"I'd do that anyway, you don't have to--"

"And you have to buy me a new swimsuit."

The way she's pigging out, you think, she's probably gonna need one anyway. "Fine," you agree. "Let's defrost those bad boys and settle this."
131111.title: Bets and breakfast

choices: She decides to go for the Contest.
She enjoys the sand and surf.
1311111.content:
Even though it was three hours after Megan had won the bet, she still looked bloated. Less so than she had after she swallowed the last of the six burritos earlier today; back then she had looked downright pregnant. When she finished, she lay on the floor moaning and rubbing her belly, only saying. "I... win....".

Now, Megan felt much better sitting in the passenger seat of your parents' van.

"I still can't believe you ate all that stuff, Megan. Talk about being overly competitive."

"Oh boo-hoo, Justin's mad because he lost a bet."

"I'm not mad, just... surprised."

"What? Didn't think your sister had it in her? I told ya!" she slapped her belly. "Iron gut!"

The two of you pulled up to Maxi's Boutique and you turned off the engine.

"Alright, let's go pick you out a suit, champion."

"Sweet... I'm gonna get the most expensive one."

"I'm not made of money."

"Then don't make bets against my belly!" said Meg, shaking her gut for emphasis. "It'll win every time!"

"I'll keep it in mind."

==========================

"How do I look?" Meg said, spinning around. She was wearing a navy blue bikini with some sort of floral print.

"Bloated."

"Shut up!" she giggled. "Besides that." You had to admit, she looked good. Although the bikini top wasn't really necessary, as there was nothing to hold, her butt did look rather nice...

"Great! ...Um, I mean, you look fine." Meg blushed.

"Pfft, don't be weird!" She smiled. "But thanks."

==========================

The two of you stepped out of the van and into the sweltering mid-July sun.

Meg was wearing her brand new bikini, and you were wearing a pair of red swim trunks with white trim and a plain white tee.

"Hoo-wee! It's a scorcher today!" you said, even though it obviously didn't need saying.

"Probably 'cause I'm here." Meg said, fanning herself.

"Yeah, yeah, sure, missy."

"Psh, Justin, you can't- WOAH!" Meg pointed in the direction opposite that which you were facing.

"What." you turned. "Oh." There was a banner reading Waterfield Annual Pie Eating Contest - Cash Prize $150 "No, Meg, come on, haven't you had enough?"

"This baby's already won me a swimsuit today! I'd be a fool not to collect my winnings!" you started to remember part of the reason that your mother put a stop to junk food in your house. Meg really loved to eat, and she could eat all the brussels sprouts in the world and stay healthy. Pies and cakes and pizza, not so much. You felt like you had to put a stop to it.

"Meg - no. Just... if you come enjoy the beach with me for now and we can do whatever you want after. There's no way you can win that contest anyway."

Meg pondered this.
1311111.title: Meg wins her bet.

choices: She's sneaked off to that contest! Boy, she's in trouble now!
There she is, coming back from other stands... with tons of food in tow!
13111112.content:
Megan crossed her arms, sighing. “Fine, whatever. You’re lucky I’m being so considerate.”

You grimace. You really didn’t want to use up those cool points so quickly. But buying snacks is one thing, and if Lauren found out he’d let Megan enter a pie eating contest, she’d have dear Mother on the phone in a heartbeat.

“Glad to hear it, oh Considerate One. Now c’mon, let’s go find a good spot.”

“Whatever.”

You walk through the crowds of beachgoers to the waters edge. The place is pretty packed, so the two of you have to venture a little ways to find a spot big enough for your beach towel.

Megan’s panting upon arrival. “Jeesh, you could’a picked a spot that wasn’t ten miles away.”

“Oh, come on, it wasn’t that far.”

“Was too. Now I’m all hot and tired.” She whined.

“Jump in the water then. That’s what it’s there for.”

“Nah. I was thinking more along the lines of ice cream.”

You roll your eyes as you spread out the towel, on which Megan promptly sprawls.

“So, where am I supposed to sit?”

“Nowhere. I was serious about that ice cream. Look, there’s a stall right over there.” She pointed up the beach to a tiki-styled bar.

You realize where she's going with this. “Fine. What do you want?”

“Hm... Chocolate chunk. Four, no, five scoops!”

You eye her sternly. “Two scoops.”

“But-”

“You’ve already eaten a large pizza and six burritos today. Two scoops.”

You walk away quickly, pretending not to notice her puppy-dog face. When you get to the shack, the deeply tanned man asks what you’d like. You hesitate before ordering four scoops of chocolate chunk. Because, well, you did see that face.

As you walk back to your spot, contemplating exactly how many cool points the extra scoops would score you, you notice that Megan isn’t on the towel anymore. Maybe she went for a swim? You scan the water, but don’t see her. Crud. Where could she have gone off to?

Panic starts to rise in you. Where would Megan have gone?
13111112.title: The Mysterious Disappearance Of Megan

choices: You found out Lauren was home and she wanted to see Meg. Uh-oh.
You looked up other food competitions, this could be easy money!
131111121.content:
You knew deep down where she had to be, but you didn't want to admit it. Cautiously, your eyes drifted over to the contest.

"Dammit, Meg."

=================================

Meg sat on the far right end of the contest table, with a smiling fat Asian guy in a Hawaiian print shirt next to her, followed by a skinny, bald, tattooed guy who looked mildly insane, a stocky black dude whose wife was trying to convince him to leave, and at the complete opposite end was a chubby girl with short blonde hair wearing a sundress. All in all, quite the assortment.

Meg turned towards the fat Asian guy. "So, how many times have you done this contest?"

"Actually, this is my first!" he said. His face looked constantly happy.

"Hey, mine too! I-" Megan suddenly stopped as she looked into the crowd. "Uh-oh."

In the crowd of people standing around, she could see you working through with cone in hand.

"Meg!" you shouted, working through the crowd. Finally, you reached the table. "Meg, what are you doing?"

"Just enjoying myself, what's it look like? Jeez Justin, calm yourself!"

"What about this cone?" you said, pointing to the dripping mound of chocolate chunk. "Aren't you going to have this?"

Meg reached over and took the cone from you.

"Of course I am, this is my pre-contest snack!"

"Meg, you really aren't going to win if you have that humongous cone as well." she was already licking the sides of the four-scoop stack.

"It isn't about winning, it's about having fun!"

"What's fun about stuffing yourself silly?"

Meg gave a blank stare.

"Food tastes good, stupid. And these pies are free! Plus, if I win, they cost negative money. That's, like, even better than free!" she went back to slurping down the melting chocolate chunk.

You were feeling really irritated, not sure if it was because of Meg's defiance or the hot sun. But standing there dumbfounded wasn't solving anything. Okay, you thought, if that's how she wants it, fine. She can eat until she bursts. That'll teach her.

"Okay, you know what, you're right Meg. I was stupid to doubt you. I'm just gonna watch, okay? Forget the beach."

"Good, I'm glad you've come around." She took another huge lick off her cone, which was diminishing in size rather quickly. "Now, watch me win this thing!"

You sat down in the folding chair under the shaded awning reserved for the audience, which was about fifty people. Who wants to see a bunch of people eat? This is dumb. And there's no way she can win, she's as thin as a twig! Meg finished up the last of her ice cream and began eating the cone. ...at least she is right now.

=================================

The announcer was a slightly buff tanned guy with blonde hair and sunglasses. He looked as if he spent every day of his life on the beach.

"Allllllllrighty folks, are we ready?"

The audience gave a scattered "yeah."

"I can't year you!"

"YEAH!"

"Well, leeeeeet's get on started then! Go!"

Three attractive women in bikinis distributed pies to the five contestants. Tattoo guy smashed his head directly into the pie and started making slurping noises.

"Round one: Blackberry!"

Your sister simply picked up one slice and began to munch on it. The others were trying to hurry themselves.

"Remember folks: It isn't a race!"

The other contestants paid this no heed. They were gobbling down pie like maniacs. Your sister, however, was just finishing her first piece. You recalled what she had said earlier: I only ate too fast 'cause of stupid Lauren. Perhaps that was her secret. At slow speed, her stomach had insane capacity, or something.

You watched with half-morbid curiosity as your sister ate one piece of the pie, then two, then three, in a very rhythmic and methodical fashion. Although the black guy and tattoo dude were already on round two (apple pie), they were eating more and more slowly. Your sister was going strong, even on top of four scoops of chocolate chunk. She's a goddamn garbage disposal.

Meg daintily ate the sixth and final slice of blackberry pie. She burped, tapped her mouth with a napkin, and then started on the apple. Hawaiian shirt was almost done with apple, but he didn't seem to be going so strongly. Chubby girl, crazy man, and the black guy all were on round three which was cherry pie. Er, well, the crazy guy wasn't still going. He was kinda just face-down in the pie. So you guess he was out. Chubby girl was two slices in, but she looked like she was done. She was only taking one bite every minute or so, rubbing her ample stomach in between. The black guy made it furthest, five slices out of six, when suddenly he looked very sick. He got up and left swiftly. Your sister was about halfway done with the apple pie, and you could see her stomach bulging a bit.

Holy hell, my little sister may actually win this. She looked over at you and gave you a thumbs-up, her cheeks bulging with pie.

=================================

Hawaiian shirt dude was done after one slice of cherry, and now he joined the rest of the crowd in cheering on your sister.

She was halfway through the cherry pie and still going, albeit slowly. Her belly looked as if she had swallowed a large cantaloupe. She patted it and burped heartily. This is disgusting you thought, yet you watched on.

Megan started on the fourth slice of cherry. Although she was past full already, she knew there was more room inside of her. She had a keen sense of her own stomach, which allowed her to perform feats like winning the bet earlier today. Meg's stomach gurgled. She bit into the oozing cherry pie, syrup dripping from the sides. She swalowed, and could feel her own belly expanding. Two more, Meg thought. Now she regretted asking for four scoops.

The fifth went down agonizingly slowly. Megan's gut had become almost round, spilling out onto her legs. But it was down, and it was going to stay down.

"Alright folks..." the announcer said in hushed tones. "she's one bite away from the lead." he was trying to build suspense. "If she can do this-"

"Done." Meg sat back in her chair and belched a loud, manly burp.

"Oh. Well, we have our champion!" he shouted, holding up Meg's hand.

=================================

Meg slept lying down in the backseat of the car on the way back home, in a food coma of sorts. In her dozing hand was the $150 she had won.

You were halfway angry, but moreso surprised. She beat four other people to win a hundred and fifty dollars like it was nothing... That's good money for one hour's worth of effort... you looked back at your sleeping sister, who looked pregnant but undeniably happy. Maybe her gluttony isn't so bad after all...

You pulled into the garage, but left your stuffed sister in the car. You didn't want to wake her. When you got inside...
131111121.title: Megan and the Pie Eating Competition

choices: You soon start seeing snacks lying in Laurens favorite spots...  Meg, what's up?
Megan stuffs it all in in one week - and has a little belly to prove it!
1311111211.content:
“Where have you been? Where’s Megan?”

These were the first words spat at you as you walked through the front door. The source of the verbal lugy sat on the lazy boy, clicker in hand.

You throw your keys on the table, smirking as you take in the scene before you. Lauren, despite the sweltering day, the AC had driven her to swaddle herself in a blanket, which was covered the distinctive black remnants of Oreos. On the coffee table beside her sat an empty glass of milk.

“Took Meg to the beach,” you say, nonchalantly.

“And? Where is she?”

“Fell asleep in the car. I didn’t want to wake her up.”

“Well, sucks for her!” she glowered. “Go and get her, we need to have a little talk.”

You shift uncomfortably. You seriously doubt Megan would be up to any sort of intelligent conversation at this point. “Well, just wait until she wakes up, alright?”

“Why? She can’t just sleep in your car.”

“W-well, why not?”

Lauren narrowed her eyes. “What’s up? You lose her or something?”

“Uh... for a little while, yea, but-”

“What?”

“Let me explain!” You take a deep breath. Better to come clean now. “I went to buy her ice cream, and she kinda snuck off andenteredaneatingcontest.”

“Whoa whoa whoa. She entered an eating contest?”

You nod grimly. “And won.”

Laurens mouth dropped. “But- why?”

“I dunno. She won a bundle, though.”

“Really? How much?” she inquired, natural greed temporarily taking hold. She quickly shook her head. “Never mind! This is just what I wanted to talk to her about -- she’s got to get rid that crap she’s got stashed in her room!”

“Why? You look like you’re enjoying it,” you add, smirking.

Lauren rolled her eyes, wiping Oreo remnants off of her lips. “Oh, shut up. I'm doing this for her own good. Go and tell the little pig that she needs to trash that shit ASAP. If mom and dad come home and she's turned into a butterball, we're both gonna be in it knee-deep.”

“Alright, alright. Fine. I’ll go and tell her.”

+++

You find Megan just where you’d left her -- laying on her side in the back of the car, face pointed away from you.

“Yo Meg, we’re home.” You nudge the catatonic girl gently on the shoulder.

“I know,” she mutters into her arm, not stirring. Her voice betrays her discomfort.

You smirk. “Regretting it yet?”

“No regrets,” she waves the handful of cash weakly. “I just wish that guy’d realized who he was messing with two pies sooner.”

She groans as she lifts herself into a sitting position. You can’t help but cringe as you look at her stomach -- it really did look like she’d gulped down a bowling ball. The tight white undershirt she was wearing over her new suit wouldn’t even cover it all the way, leaving a crescent of stuffed flesh uncovered.

A painful sounding gurgled emanated from the dome, and Megan gingerly placed both hands on her abdomen.

“Oh... it did not like that...” she grimaced. She froze for a second, not daring to move, before releasing a loud, wet belch. “Whew. Yea. I really kind of hate that guy right now.”

You smile politely. “Hey now, be fair. You're the one who decided it was a good idea to enter an eating contest after four scoops of ice cream."

She rolled her eyes.

"Now, listen, I know you wanna sleep this off, but Lauren is in there, demanding we toss the lot that you stashed in your room. Oh, and she’s demolished a pack of your Oreos. The orange ones, I think.”

This elicited a small smile from the suffering Megan. “She’s such a dweeb. No self control.” She was silent for a moment, thinking.

“Well, we’re not going to throw them out. That means she’d win.” She smiled devilishly. “Don’t worry, though, I got a plan. Just tell her that I tossed 'em, would you? I'll take care of the rest.”
1311111211.title: Stuffed And Scheming

choices: You let her go. I mean, cash money, right?
You tell her to stay here. Mom AND Lauren would kill you.
13111112112.content:
It had been one week now since the eating contest, when Lauren told Meg to get rid of all the junk food. In the seven days that had transpired, Meg had been constantly eating. When you looked in her room, she would be munching away at a bag of chips or a box of cookies. Whenever Lauren left the house, she would cook up a frozen pizza or some frozen chicken nuggets and eat those. It seemed as though her stomach was bottomless as she went through her nonstop food orgy. The bags upon bags of food started to dissipate into thin air. She would pop a can of soda, drink it, and then as soon as she was done pop open another one.

You had to admit, you were impressed. You thought that food would last for months. Still, you saw your sister's display of gluttony at the pie eating competition, she was undeniably skilled in the sport of consumption.

Meg walked down the stairs towards you, looking altogether different than she had before your first trip to the SaveWay SuperNexus. Her thighs had grown in thickness a bit. She now had a bit of a chubby tummy that stuck out about three inches, making her blue t-shirt stretch. It rode up and revealed about an inch of curvaceous belly near the bottom of her gut. Her almost nonexistant breasts might have grown ever so slightly, but it could have easily been your imagination.

She jaunted down the stairs, her tiny belly jiggling with every step. She carried an open box of cookies. At the bottom step, she reached in, pulled a cookie out, popped it in her mouth, and crumpled up the bag.

"It's officially all gone!"

It was no wonder where it had went. Meg had easily gained 15 pounds over this week, maybe 20. Only the scale would tell. You hoped she could burn it off before Mom came home in a few months.

"Finally. Now can we go, please?" you asked, feeling exasperated.

"Where are we going again?"

"The grocery store."

"Oh... nah, I better not go, you saw what happened last time." she smacked her new belly, causing it to jiggle.

==========================================

When you returned with your boring regular groceries (fruits, veggies, eggs, milk), Meg was sitting in front of the TV watching something. But when she saw you walk through the door, she ran over to you and gave you a hug, pressing her new belly flesh against you.

"Justiiiiin! The beeeest brother in the woooorld!" Your face immediately fell flat.

"What do you want, Meg?"

"Okay, so, when I signed up for the pie competition I got put on a mailing list and there's a burger cook-off in Shelbyville tomorrow. Whoever eats the most burgers gets... get this: TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY DOLLARS!" Meg was beaming.

"Meg, I don't-"

"Plus!" she cut in. "...You'd get a cut of the profits!"

You felt conflicted. On one hand, money. On the other, your mom would kill you.

"What's mom gonna say if she comes home and finds two fat daughters instead of just one?"

That got a laugh out of Meg.

"Come on, drive me... I've got a real knack for this sort of thing! I'm not gonna get all tubby like Lauren."

You wanted to point out that that had kinda already happened.
13111112112.title: The Week of Stuffing

choices: The two of you head off for a night of hamburger-eating practice.
Suddenly Lauren comes home.  "And what exactly are YOU TWO up to?"
131111121121.content:
"Okay, okay. You can go--"

"Yes!" Megan pumped her fist.

"On one condition!"

She frowned. "I'm not gonna like this, am I?"

"Probably not, but tough. The condition is that after the contest, win or lose, you have to go on a diet. And you have to exercise every day, too, okay? Also, if you win, you can't blow your whole share of the prize on junk food."

She crossed her arms. "That's three conditions, Einstein."

"They're all part of an overarching megacondition about Mom and Dad not finding out how much I've been letting you eat."

"Oh, come onnn!" Megan grumped. "Don't be such a worrywart! I got rid of the evidence, didn't I?"

"Right. And now you need to get rid of the evidence of you getting rid of evidence." You poked her pot belly. "Namely, this."

She snorted in irritation, pffting a few loose strands of hair out of her eyes. "Fine. Whatever."

"Pinky swear."

"O-kaaaay, I pinky swear!" She brightened. "So this means you're cool with me entering eating contests, right?"

When did it become 'contests', plural? you wondered.

------------

"Absolutely not."

"Pleeeease?"

"No! We're not driving around to every fast food joint in town to buy you burgers!"

"But I have to train! I mean, obviously that's covered under entering the contests, 'cause practice is a part of competing."

"Megan, you're practically busting out of your jeans as it is. You're supposed to be on a diet!"

"You said 'after the contest'!" she pointed out.

"But--" You paused. She had you there.

"All right. Let's go. But you're only getting diet soda."

------------

Megan ran up to change and tromped back downstairs in a sleeveless T-shirt and her gym shorts.

"Pretty good uniform, huh?" she asked.

"Uniform?"

"Well, if I'm gonna be a pro, I gotta have a cool uniform, right?" She pulled on the waistband of her shorts and let go, snapping it into her soft waist. "See? Elastic. Plenty of room for if my stomach sticks out after eating."

"If?"

She shot you a look. "Speaking of which, check out my cool logo!" She pulled her T-shirt out a bit, showing off the picture she'd drawn in colored sharpie.

"A... a two-armed pink octopus?"

"It's a stomach! Geez, you dummy, come on!"

"Why's it on your chest then? Shouldn't it be down here on the north slope of Mount Megan?"

"'Cause my chest is a lot fla--ah, I mean, 'cause everyone knows logos go on your chest, duh." She blushed a little. "Are we going or not?"
131111121121.title: Terms and Conditions

choices: Competition day! Meg eats a big breakfast before, to stretch her stomach!
Competition day! Meg refuses to eat before so she'll perform well.
1311111211211.content:
The first stop on Megan's training journey was to Royal Burger. The harsh fluorescent lighting combined with the sticky tile made you feel uneasy. Typically, you didn't frequent fast food joints. Your mother of course did not allow you to go to such places, and even though you could drive yourself you never really developed a taste for the greasy fare.

Megan, however, was in heaven. She was grinning from ear to ear as she smelled the grease of the fryer and took in the sound of sizzling fat on the grill. She looked at the expansive menu with utter glee on her face.

"Thanks again for helping me train, Justin!" Meg said, beaming.

"Yeah, yeah, I'm only going to pay for five of your burgers." she looked extremely disappointed. "...and, your drink." she smiled again, but she still had her puppy-dog eyes on.

"Oh-kaaaay... Thanks anyway." Were you still cool? You hoped so. You decided to make sure.

"...Actually Meg, just get whatever you want. I'll pay." Her smile was back and bigger than ever. She approached the greasy looking teenager at the counter.

"I'd like ten cheeseburgers and a large vanilla shake." Meg said, brimming with excitement.

"Hey, I said you had to get a diet drink!" You protested.

"...and a large diet cola, too."

"No! I meant instead!"

Too late.

=================================================

Meg brought her tray back to the table, a small burg of burgers dominated by her two tall towers of beverage.

"You know, the stomach is a muscle just like any other, Justin." your sister explained, sitting down. "You gotta work it if you wanna use it effectively, and it's important to stretch it before you compete!"

"Is that so?" you said, absentmindedly. You were thinking about how hard Lauren was going to kill you. Would it hurt a lot, or a little?

"Uh, yeah, it is. Who's the professional eater here, me or you?" Meg said, before shoving the first cheeseburger into her mouth.

"One competition does not a professional make." she swallowed the bite she was chewing so that she could retort.

"More professional than you, anyway. And DAMN, these burgers are delicious!" Meg took another ravenous bite of the greasy american fare.

"Watch the language, Meg. Also, it's just fast food, nothing special." Megan had finished her first cheeseburger and was now gulping down her shake.

"So, you're saying... All fast food is this good?" She held up her second burger before biting violently down into it. Her mind filled with dopamine. The pleasure from the flavor of greasy beef and sweet ketchup and pickle and mustard and onions, oh it was all so GOOD!

"I guess so." You had forgotten that your sister was not accustomed to the flavor of fast food.

"We gotta try another place!"

"At least finish your damn order first before you talk about going other places!"

"Watch the language, Justin." she grinned widely at you.

=================================================

Although Meg had always been a big eater, even when your mother was around, the pie eating contest in combination with the week of reckless eating that she had done had increased her stomach capacity quite noticeably. When the tenth burger had slid down her greedy gullet to accompany the mass of vanilla shake and diet soda, her stomach was bulging an inch or two, yet she still wasn't finished with her training. Her pink shirt was pulled tight, but it still managed to cover her stomach.

"You gotta work past your limits, Justin. That's the secret to success." Megan said, opening the door to the next stop on her training tour. Her brace-covered smile was as wide as ever.

"Are you at your limit yet?"

"Not even close." she looked at you and winked.

"Hi, welcome to Micky's, home of the MickyBurger. I'd be pleased to take your order." came the voice from over the counter, who sounded like he wanted to die.

MickyBurger, to you, was even more disgusting than Royal Burger. But Meg at least seemed happy.

"Ten... MickyBurgers, please!"

"I'm guessing that's to go."

"No, for here." the guy behind the counter looked mildly surprised, then disgusted.

"Your total is ten eighty-five."

Meg swiveled around to look at you, puppy-dog eyes set on full blast. This time, you refused to be persuaded.

"I got the first round, missy. Use your own cash."

Meg sighed, then pulled out her wallet.

=================================================

Meg was on her fifth MickyBurger with no signs of stopping. Her already padded tummy was now pushing her once-loose shirt up. The stomach with arms now looked like he had fallen into an industrial crusher.

Her belly was in her lap, and with each bite you thought: more and more pounds to work off... why am I letting her do this? But you didn't intervene.

Meg was about to put her sixth in her mouth when she stopped, eyes wide. Then she gave a wet burp and continued unheeded.

"Very lady-like, princess Meg."

"Fuff youf."

"I can't understand you with your mouth full of food, your highness."

"Oh god, shut up!" she smiled. She bit into the sixth MickyBurger (her sixteenth overall, christ) and began to chew. "Whoo, remember that talk about limits?" Meg said, patting her belly.

"Yes, your majesty?"

"I think I'm getting there."

"Yeah, you look like you swallowed a watermelon whole."

"I feel like it, too." she finished off the sixth MickyBurger.

=================================================

All in all, Meg ate nineteen burgers, but had you take the twentieth back home with you.

She sat in the passenger seat, cradling her overstuffed belly.

"I gotta confession to make, Justin. I'm pregnant. Food is the father."

She really did look pregnant. Her shirt had been pulled up and was little more than a ring around her upper torso. She kept rubbing her belly, which when stuffed with nearly twenty burgers in combination with her seventeenish pounds of gained weight really did look monumental. It sat in her lap, pushing out at least five inches. It was hard as a rock.

Her stomach grumbled, she moaned, she burped. She really was stuffed. Her belly was constantly complaining with all sorts of noises.

"Ya think you overdid it?"

"This isn't overdoing it! This is just a prelude to the main event, remember!"

"Uh-huh. Just try not to stuff yourself so full you explode tomorrow."

"I won't, silly. Twenty burgers? On top of a vanilla shake and a diet coke?! Who can compete with Meg- *BURP* -'the stomach' McCoy?!?"

"No one who's sane."

"That's what I'm counting on." She grinned.

=================================================

Lauren's car was missing from the driveway when you got home, quite the blessing, as Meg was stuffed as hell. You had to help her get out of the car just so she could waddle up to bed.

"♪ IIIII ammmm the chaaampiiioooon, my friiiiends~ ♫" Meg sang as she moved slowly to her room.

"You're a piece of work, Megan."

"Yeah, but you love me anyway. Thanks again for helping me, Justin."

"Uhh, yeah, no problem. But don't forget about your diet, Meg, seriously. You're going to get really fat eating like that."

"You have my word." She started to draw a motion of a cross over her heart but her hand collided with her belly, which was protruding from her shirt up to the bellybutton. "Well, you get the idea."

You turned to go to your bed.

"Oh, and... Justin..." Meg's voice was suddenly very serious. You looked over, expecting something deep and heartfelt. "Do you have that last burger?"

Your face immediately became a mask of disappointment as you threw her the bag.

"Knock yourself out, kid."

You moved into your room and slid beneath the covers.

Meg ate her last burger and passed out in the food coma of the century.
1311111211211.title: Stomach-stretching Practice Run.

choices: A chubby Korean girl in a hoodie and cargo pants.
A buff, blonde Amazon dressed in cowgirl chic.
13111112112112.content:
"All right! I am ready to win!" Meg said, stomping downstairs and pumping her arm gleefully.

You look up from your cereal. "Good morning, winner. You want a banana or something, or are you still working off last night?"

"Ha! I digested that stuff easy. But no breakfast for me. I need this baby in tip-top condition today!"

She patted her chubby stomach. Tip-top condition?, you think. She'd never been in worse shape in her life.

You raise an eyebrow. "What's this? Megan 'the stomach' McCoy is actually worried she might lose?"

"Pfft, no," she says, smiling slyly. "I just want to give people a good show."

"Uh, yeah, speaking of... about those shorts," you say.

"What about them?"

"They're a little too small on you."

"They're just snug!" Megan protests. "I think it's cute!"

"Well, when you bend over I can see your cute little underbutt."

She pulls the shorts down, blushing a little.

"Now I can see your butt crack. They're too small, Meg. What about your jeans? You've got to have at least one pair you can still get into."

"W-well... yes and no." She giggles awkwardly. "Mostly no."

"Meg! I told you all those burgers were a bad idea! What are you going to wear from now on?"

"It wasn't the burgers!" she protests. "I'm just a little bloated!"

"From?"

"From... well, the burgers, but--" she stammers, "but it's gonna go away!"

"It better, Princess Pudgy."

"It will! Now, can we go, please?" she asks. "I'm starving!"

------

The Shelbyville Burger Cook-Off was a big event. There must have been fifty different stands selling everything from plain old cheeseburgers to expensive concoctions of Kobe Beef to bison burgers to hamburger pizza. You can hear Meg's stomach growling from here.

"I've got to eat something," she groans.

"Channel that energy into winning," you suggest.

"I'll never make it to the contest," she says melodramatically. "I'm gonna starve to death right here!"

"Oh, look at that, the chubbiest famine victim ever," you say. "Well, I want to try one of those shrimp burgers. You stay here and keep that stomach in tip-top condition."

Megan grumbles as you eat the hamburger in front of her, but her irritation turns to anticipation as you approach the competition stage and sees the row of grills shining in the sun, waves of heat already rippling the air.

"Oh, man," she moans. "This is gonna be so good."

"Hey! Meg, right?"

You turn to see the Hawaiian shirt man from the pie-eating contest waving cheerfully. Except this time his shirt is red and yellow; the better to not show ketchup and mustard stains, you guess.

"Hi!" Megan says, smiling. "I didn't know you'd be here!"

"I didn't know you would," he says. "Are you turning pro or something?"

"No," you say, at the same time she says, "yes."

"Well, hey, good luck," he says. "You might even get second place!"

"Oh? You're awful sure or yourself for someone who went dowwwwan last time." She folds her arms and smirks.

"Ah, no, that's not what I meant!" Hawaiian Shirt Guy says. "Sorry, I didn't think how that'd sound. I meant the two of us are going to be battling for second. Nobody beats 'The Eating Machine'. She's a pro. Like, literally. This is how she makes her living."

"Aw, I can take her," Megan says confidently. "Where is this 'Eating Machine'?"

"Over there," HSG said, pointing across the crowd to--
13111112112112.title: Burger Overture

choices: Lauren sets a plan in motion to fatten Meg!
Megan tries hard to get in shape. However, sometimes trying isn't enough.
131111121121121.content:
"Over there," HSG said, pointing across the crowd to a chubby Korean girl in a hoodie and cargo pants.

The 'Eating Machine' was talking to a crowd of entranced onlookers, gesticulating wildly as she told some sort of funny anecdote. She was too far away to hear, but the story apparently came to a climax; the crowd went wild with laughter.

"She doesn't look so tough!" Meg crowed. "Hell, I could probably out eat her by a factor of two!"

You had other thoughts. "She's a professional eater that goes by the name of 'The Eating Machine', Megan. I'm pretty sure you don't stand a chance."

"Oh, yeah, well does she have her own team uniform!?" Meg said gleefully, while stretching out her 'stomach with arms' shirt.

"Actually, yes, I saw her wearing it earlier." Hawaiian Shirt Guy chimed in. Meg frowned.

"Well gee, no need to be such a downer..." Meg stopped short.

"Leo." The Hawaiian Shirt Guy replied, smiling as always.

"Alright then, Leo, let's go interrogate the competition!" said Megan as she bounded off towards 'The Eating Machine'. You simply rolled your eyes and trailed behind them.

============================================================================ ==

'The Eating Machine' had just finished up a conversation when Meg tapped her on the shoulder.

"Oh! Hello!" said the Eating Machine as she turned around. "Can I help you?"

"Yeah you can, by surrendering now so I don't have to waste my time!" said Meg, accompanied with some sort of gesture in which she pointed at the ground with both index fingers.

You put your hand on your face and groaned.

"Haha, I like your competitive spirit! What's your name?"

"Megan 'the stomach' McCoy, and yours?"

"A lot of people call me 'The Eating Machine', but you can call me Kylie."

"I expect you to use my full title." Meg said, crossing her arms.

"Hehe. Alright, Megan 'the stomach' McCoy, do you really think you can win?"

"I'd better! This is my final competition, I gotta go out with a bang!"

"...As long as you don't literally explode." You chimed in.

Meg turned to you. "Pfft! You kiddin' bro? This stomach can take THE WOOOORLD!" She accompanied this by gripping her belly with both hands and shaking it.

"Still. No need to overdo it."

"Wait wait wait, last competition?" started Kylie, "Why're you giving up?"

"Ah, my mom's a health nut." said Meg with a dismissive hand wave. "She'd go crazy if I kept this up."

"Well, I guess you should be thankful she's let you compete so far!" Kylie said with a smile.

"Um, she doesn't, uh, know."

"Oh! Well then, good luck out there today! I'll be rooting for you!" Kylie turned away to speak to some other fans on her way to the competition table.

============================================================================ ==

Leo and Meg sat next to each other on the far left end of the table. Kylie, the Eating Machine, sat in the middle. It kinda looked like the last supper, if Jesus and his disciples were instead total fatasses. Meg looked so happy up there among the others, but you were concerned. She might've been a little glutton, but the rest of them were big gluttons. She had no chance.

The competition's burgers were actually a little smaller than the ones at Royal Burger, plus they lacked toppings. So, the first round of ten burgers was a piece of cake. Meg wolfed down burger after burger, grinning happily with each bite. A thin coating of grease covered her hands and lips as she went on. Nobody seemed to have a problem with this first round, and so round two began. Your sister was eating like you'd never seen her before, and yet she still retained her signature style of eating carefully. It was almost as if calculating the perfect way to fill every inch of her stomach. She was around seventeen burgers in and Meg was starting to feel a bit of fullness. And yet, she loved the feeling. She loved food! The taste of the greasy, salty, burgers was oh so satisfying, especially to a girl who was raised on tofu and celery.

Round two was up, and everybody was still in the competition. Meg rubbed a greasy hand over her belly, which was looking quite round from her point of view, as they brought out the next plate of ten. Megan began to think she might've gotten in a bit over her head. Nobody except Leo seemed to be slowing down, and she was feeling rather full. She started on the burgers anyway, working through the fullness. Twenty two burgers down and her stomach was saying "no more." Leo had actually stopped at this point. Meg rubbed her taut belly and managed a burp. That should clear up more space. Twenty three... she was actually having to force herself to swallow now. The almost fifteen pounds she'd gained on top of the nearly two dozen burgers had stretched her belly to a point that it was now about six inches out from where it had been before summer had started. It looked as if she'd swallowed a small watermelon, and she felt about the same. Her stomach was feeling a bit of pain, now. There was no way she could win, she had to acknowledge it.

Meg attempted to eat one more bite, which sent a ripple of pain through her belly. She set the burger down, she was done. Looking down the row, she could see a lot of people were still eating. In the end, she placed fourth to last. Kylie had won of course, with a whopping count of fifty-two. A long shot from the world record, but Kylie wasn't going for the record, she just out-ate the runner up by one.

============================================================================ ==

Megan sat in the passenger seat of the car, her painfully throbbing belly pink from stretching. Her shirt rode up way past her bellybutton and the spherical mass of her stuffed gut sat in her lap. She tried to hold back tears as she looked down at her ribbon: 'Participant'.

"Oh come on Meg, you got to compete, don't be so sad."

"I'm a failure, Justin! My competitive career is over!" Her stomach punctuated this with a gurgle and she set her hand on her gut, wincing.

"Yeah, yeah, tough. Now, you're going to work this weight off when, we get home, right?"

"I will." Meg resigned, sadly. She leaned her seat back and turned onto her side. Meg drifted off to sleep.

============================================================================ ==

You walked inside the house through the garage and left your keys on the key rack. Lauren was in the living room.

"Where were you two today?" she said in her nosy way.

"Meg entered another eating contest."

"She did!?!" Lauren shouted incredulously from the couch. "You irresponsible maniac! Mom is gonna skin you alive!"

"God, don't get your panties in a twist, Lauren. It's her last contest, ever. She's going on an exercise regimen tomorrow."

"She'd better!"

You wandered back to your room to play some video games.

Around ten minutes later, Meg waddled in, cradling her stuffed belly.

"Oooh..."

"Holy shit!" Lauren exclaimed, sitting upright. "Meg, you look like you're pregnant!"

"Don't remind me. I ate so much, and for what? I'm a loser, Lauren."

"I already knew that much."

"God, just shut up." Meg shuffled off to her room and laid down for a nap.

Lauren looked down at her belly, then remembered Meg's. Megan was looking bigger than she was! She can't tease me about being fat if she's fatter than me...
131111121121121.title: Meg's Second Eating Competition.

choices: Lauren, who sought to continue the fattening
You, who sought to make her exercise
1311111211211211.content:
"I got it!" Lauren mused. "All I got to do is trick that cow into binging a few more times and she'll grow thicker than an elephant. And I've got just the plan to do it..."

Lauren knew just what to do. Megan, as laid back as she pretended to be, was a prideful girl, especially when it came to matter of her gullet. She was damn proud of her ability to shove garbage food down her eager throat with ease. Therefore, Lauren surmised, she would use this to her advantage. With a mischievous twinkle in her eye, Lauren pulled herself off the couch and entered the kitchen, preparing her dark deed.

For the next three hours, the health-nut slaved over the stove, creating a bevy of dishes that disgusted her on a moral level; a pound of hamburger meat mixed with noodles and cheese, deep-fried Twinkies, and sausage wrapped in bacon were just a few of the awfully fattening meals she was forced to make. The smell alone made her nauseous, but the wonderful promise that Meg would soon be sending all these calorie bombs straight into her stomach was more than enough to keep her going.

At the end of the preparation, after she had set all of their plates and was about to call them down, Lauren heard the stairs being to creak. As if on schedule, the plump Meg was deciding them. In the hours that had passed, her stomach had taken the time to digest its contents, returning the stomach back to its flabby base state. More important was her attire; in the time since she had taken a nap and come back down, Megan had decided to change into her (now-ill fitting) exercising uniform. It consisted of a light blue sports bra and matching spandex shorts.

Lauren had to stifle a laugh. The spandex shorts, once loose on her sisters thin body, now strained against the thickness of her fatty thighs and enlarged waist. Worse still, the sports bra provided little cover up top, allowing Lauren to watch with glee as Megan's pudgy belly wiggled and jiggled with each successive step. It was truly a sight to behold. As her sister took the final step down, Lauren inquired about the change.

"Looking to work out, Meg?" she asked playfully.

"Ugh, don't remind me. Justin's forcing me to workout as part of the eating contest deal. How do I look, by the way? I was afraid this thing might not fit me anymore."

Lauren circled her sister, pretending to evaluate her.

"You look fine, Meg. A little tight, but nothing to worry about. Now come on, let's go eat."

As the last word left Lauren's lips, Meg's eyes seemed to light up for the first time since they had returned. The two hurried back to the kitchen, only for her sadness to return. The food, as it had been set out, was unfairly distributed. Nearly 70% of the food was on or near Megan's plate, with the rest divided up between Lauren and yours.

"You bitch, are you trying to say I'm fat?" Meg whined.

"Oh, shut up, butterball. I just thought the champion would like a fitting meal, but I guess you're a loser after all, huh?"

Still upset by her loss, Megan was hit hard by that insult. Not one to be stood up, she marched over to her plate.

"Oh yeah, you wanna see a loser!?"

Like a hunger jackal, she descended on her food, scooping up mouthfuls of food and shoving them into her waiting maw. The determined girl didn't even waste time to chew, swallowing the mass like a snake. It was quite the spectacle. Lauren was squirming in delight at her ravenous meal, mentally counting the calories her sister was downing with each swallow.

As the last of the Twinkies disappeared from her emptied plate, Megan let off a victorious burp. The stuffed girl had swallowed approximately three deep-fried Twinkies, four bacon wrapped sausages, and a third-quarters pound of the meat casserole. All in all, Lauren calculated the damage at three and a half thousand calories. More than enough for a single pound of fat.

But she was not done there. With a snide grin on her face, the still hungry girl shot over to her older sister's plate. Feigning shock, Lauren let of an insincere slew of insults as Megan ripped it off the table and began to shovel the smaller portions into her mouth. Lauren smirked with hidden glee as another fifteen hundred calories made their way into Megan's system.

With her older sister's meal fully devoured, Megan collapsed onto the kitchen floor. Her stomach was now bloated to its previously spherical shape. She began to moan in pain, unable to lift herself off the floor. Lauren, still feigning her anger, stomped off back to her room, full of rage. Once in the secrecy of her room, though, she let of a joyful cackle.

"That was beautiful!" she thought to herself. "I can't wait to see how pudgy she is tomorrow!"

Meg, her endurance beaten down by the day's binging, couldn't muster the strength to stand. Giving in to her fate, she pathetically decided to sleep on the floor. The next day she was discovered by...
1311111211211211.title: Lauren's First Step

choices: It was just a random car, but it made Meg notice a Super Donuts nearby.
It was Lauren's car, and she was pulling up beside Megan.
13111112112112112.content:
When Meg opened her bleary eyes, the first thing she saw was your disappointed face as you stood above her in your bathrobe with a bowl of oatmeal.

"Heh... M-mornin' big bro!"

"So, what happened to the exercise, Meg?" You asked disappointedly, poking her plump little tummy with your toe.

"I tried to, Justin! Oof-" She let out a groan as she sat up on the kitchen floor, making her chubbiness more evident. "But Lauren was challenging me! I had to defend my honor!"

"No, you didn't. God, Megan, look at yourself. You've never been in worse shape." You held out your hand, and your sister took it. You pulled her to her feet, though it scared you a bit how hard it was to do so.

"I'm going to exercise!" Meg pouted, crossing her arms.

"That's what you said yesterday, Meg, and you went and ate deep fried twinkies instead."

"It was Lauren! She made all that unhealthy food!"

"She didn't force you to eat it. You need to learn some restraint, otherwise you're never going to burn this fat off."

"Hhmph. I'm not fat."

"You're getting there. Look, you're already dressed. Go for a walk."

"But-!"

"Now."

Meg opened her mouth to protest, but thought better of it and simply frowned and walked out the door. Her thicker thighs swished together as she walked, and her chubby butt jiggled in her ill-fitting spandex shorts. She walked around the corner, and you heard the front door open - and slam shut behind her.

You shook your head - you didn't want to be the kind of no-fun authoritarian figure that Megan was making you out to be. But you couldn't very well let her get out of shape lest your mother skin you alive.

===============================

Megan walked around the neighborhood, acting pouty and kicking rocks. Justin is being stupid, she thought, I don't need to exercise. Meg looked down at her stomach, her partner in crime for these past two weeks of hedonism and gave it a light grab. It was rounded and supple, and squished under her fingers. Meg frowned.

"I'm not fat." She said, to no one in particular.

Her legs ached, her body was sweaty, and worst of all her stomach groaned - and she was barely two blocks away from the house. Just then, the sound of a revving engine got her attention.
13111112112112112.title: You, who sought to make her exercise

choices: Dairy Queen
An Amateur Eating Competition
131111121121121122.content:
The particular sound of the car's engine was all-too familiar. Turning towards the street, Megan was greeted by the smiling visage of her sister. Lauren's eyes traced the edges of Megan's pudgy form from head-to-toe, taking in the full figure of her flabbiness. Around twenty extra pounds had been added to her frame since your parents left for their little vacation, and if Lauren was to get her way, a few more would be added by the end of the night.

"Ugh, just leave me alone," Meg shouted to her sister, kicking a rock in protest.

"Don't be such a baby, Meg. I'm actually here to help you, you know," Lauren replied.

"Please, why the hell would you help me?"

"Hop in the car and I'll explain everything, sis'. Besides, judging from how damp your clothes are, I'd say you could use a rest."

That part Megan could not deny. Her new mass, combined with the moderate fall heat, had left her tuckered out. A glistening layer of sweat covered her body, shimmering in the sun like a protective layer of diamond. Though distrustful of her manipulative sister, she took Lauren up on the offer, preferring the air-condition car to the heat of the sun.

"So, explain to me," Megan began, sliding into the passenger seat, "What are you doing here?"

"Like I said, sis', I want to help you accomplish your dream. To help you win an eating competition."

"Psh, yeah right," Megan said, rolling her eyes, "you got pissed when I proved you wrong yesterday."

"That's exactly why! I doubted you at first, but after your little performance yesterday I'm convinced. You're the real deal!"

Megan crossed her arms, resting them on the small alcove that her belly formed.

"I dunno, this is just too odd for you. Why are you really doing this, Lauren?"

"To be honest, there is another reason...", Lauren said, trailing off. She reached across the seat and pinched Megan's love-handle, trapping an inch of flab between her thumb and index fingers. "I don't think you have enough time to lose all that flab before Mom and Dad get back. Might as well help you enjoy it instead, right?"

Megan responded with an even more skeptical expression.

"Fine, fine, I understand, you don't trust me. In that case, lemme prove it to ya. We're going to..."
131111121121121122.title: Lauren's Assistance

choices: More eating!
More shopping!
1311111211211211221.content:
"Are you serious? Ten dollars for this?" Lauren groaned.

In her lap sat the newest desert at the popular ice cream chain. It was a twelve hundred calorie soft-serve bowl, loaded with all kinds of chocolate toppings and fillings. It would have been a perfect item to stuff Megan with if not for one distinct issue. It was tiny. Beyond tiny, really. The bowl itself was slightly larger than her fist. Even if it was calorie-rich, it certainly wasn't filling.

"So this is your plan to help me win? Buying me desert?" Megan asked, staring at the bowl.

"Shut up, Meg. You know I never eat this filth. How was I supposed to know the thing would be so small?"

"Well, most people, you know, non-health-freaks, tend to have fast food every once in a while."

Lauren was tempted to drive a fist right into her sister's meaty gut but managed to hold herself back. She just needed to put up with Meg's bull a few days longer before she could finally claim to be skinnier than her sister. She just needed a way to stuff Megan's stomach yet another time. And since the legitimate route was clearly to expensive, she was going to have to get creative.

A flash of brilliance gave Lauren just the plan she needed. Taking the bowl from between her legs, she brought it up to her chest. Tilting it back, she let the contents slide out, falling directly onto her exposed cleavage. Her tits and bra were soaked by the partially melted soft-serve. Megan's eyes went wide.

"Kya, what are you doing? I didn't say I wouldn't eat it!" she shouted.

"Quiet down, little pig," Lauren said with a shiver, "I'm about to get you all you can eat. Just follow my lead.

---

The small bell above the entryway jingled as Lauren stepped in to the Dairy Queen with a look of pure annoyance plastered on her face. Her exposed chest glistened in the lighting. Megan stalked closely behind, sticking herself against the walls to avoid detection. Thankfully, the restaurant was entirely devoid of customers. The only other person there was the sole employee, a young teenager boy standing behind the counter.

"Excuse me!" Lauren shouted as she approached, "I need to talk to your manager!"

"Uh, about what?" the boy replied. His eyes were locked directly at Lauren's bosom.

"Hell-o, isn't it obvious? You're stupid ice cream fell apart on me. My boobs are soaked!" she said while simultaneously pushing them upwards, making them appear even larger.

The sexual-starved young teen was drawn in by the titillating distraction, providing Megan with the moment she needed. She snuck passed the counter and made a bee line for the soft-serve machine. Locking her lips around the nozzle, she pulled the lever down. A thick rope of the cream began to force its way down her throat.

"I, Uh, well," the boy stammered.

He tumbled back, collapsing to the kitchen tile.

"Tyler!" the other boy shouted as he rushed to his aid.

Megan, ashamed at having caused such a mess, pushed her way through the door, spitting out apology after apology. So distracted by her attempts at appeasement was Megan that she hardly noticed a wet spot on the floor. One misstep later and she tumbled forward, the poor girl flailing awkwardly trying to stop all one hundred and eighty pounds of herself from falling. The second employee only noticed the boulder of flesh when it was only a foot away, far too late to react.

Her big, flabby stomach slammed against the poor kid, bringing them both to the hard tile below. Megan's soft fat melted against every nook and cranny of his face, covering his nose, mouth, and eyes like a fine layer of plaster cast. He struggled against the weighty beast smothering him, slapping, smacking, and punching her gut. Too weak to inflict serious injury, all he managed to do was tickle her.

Megan, on the other-hand, found herself enjoying the whole thing. For some reason, feeling the man struggle under all of her fatty pounds turned her on like nothing before. See had seen something like it on television a few years back, on some sleazy daytime TV show. They called it crushing, if she recalled correctly. Not long into it, the employee finally passed out from lack of oxygen, his arms going limp. Rolling off her victim, Megan was relieved as he took a deep breathe the second she got off. He was unconscious, but alive.

Lauren, having heard the commotion, finally walked in, gasping at the sight of the two employees and Megan.

"What the hell did you do?" Lauren demanded to know.

"That guy accidentally ran into the wall," Megan said, motioning to the first one. "The other guy here got trapped under me and fell unconscious."

"Well ain't that great!" Lauren shouted sarcastically. Taking notice of all the available food, her tone shifted. "In any case, let's hurry up, we don't have all day."

Lauren swiped a few bags off the counter and began shoveling countless burgers, fries, and all sorts of fatty foods. Megan, ignoring her sister's attempts, went straight to the friers. Reaching in to the cabinet below, she found her goal: four vats of congealed lard. As delicious as it was fattening, there was no better food for gaining. If you could even call it food.

Five minutes later and the two sped out of the parking lot, their loot obtained. Lauren had about twelve bags stuffed with food while Megan had succeeded at obtaining all four vats. Eager to give it a try, she popped one opened and tipped it back, allowing the semi-liquid to slide into her mouth.

"Ew," Lauren said, unable to hold back her revulsion. "Are you really eating that? It's like pure fat!"

"It's not like pure fat," Megan corrected, "It is pure fat. Nothing better for gaining,".

Megan breathe went shallow as she swallowed the gelatinous goop, not from the meal, but from what had happened in the kitchen. Squashing the poor kid was a lot hotter than she had expected and she could not wait to do it again.

The car pulled into your driveway not long after.

"Okay, so where do you want to hide this stuff. And how do we get it in?" Lauren pondered.

Ignoring her sister, Megan wobbled from her seat and made her way to the door.

"Hey, stop, what if Justin sees you like that?"

"Who cares," Megan dismissed. "You were right, Lauren, I really do love my bigger body. And you know what? I don't care what Justin thinks. If he gets to fussy then he might just wind up like that kid at the McDonald's. Or worse."

Lauren watched as the monster she created disappeared through the front door.

"Wow, she's really into this whole thing. This is even better then I had hoped!" she thought.

The only worry she had was about you. Did you happen to come across your no-so-little sister gorging herself, or did she make it through the night uninterrupted?
1311111211211211221122112.title: Not as Planned

choices: You go look for Megan.
You call your mother. This is out of control.
13111112112112112211221121.content:
You were on your laptop writing a paper for your English class when you heard it. At first, it was just visible as ripples in your coffee. Then the thumping started, rising in volume as something trudged down the hallway. Your fingers froze in place on the keyboard and your eyes veered from the screen just in time to catch a glimpse of the monstrosity heading through the doorframe.
