It was your kid sister, but not the version you knew a week ago. A bit of flab hung out from her spandex shirt as she tilted back the coffee can full of lard and gulped down the last of it. One hand rubbed her burgeoning stomach and the other wiped the grease from her mouth with one sleeve. You couldn't quite comprehend what you were seeing.

"Meg..." You started, your eyes wide in alarm. "What's going on? I thought you two were going to the gym."

Meg burped, dropping the can on the ground with a loud clang. "Not anymore, brother!" she bellowed, her ass jiggling in its tight confines as she waddled to the fridge. "I was destined to be big!" Meg grabbed a two-liter bottle of Cherry Fizz and popped off the cap, starting to chug.

Now, you were feeling absolutely terrified. You rose from your seat and started to stride towards her. "Hey, cut it out! Where's Lauren? Did she let you-"

Meg pulled the bottle out of her mouth defensively, spilling some on her shirt. "Stop!" She burped. "I finally found something that makes me happy and I'm not going to let you ruin it for me!"

"Well, I don't care what you think." You said sternly. "I'm going to go kill Lauren and then we're going to put you on an express exercise regimen."

"You better not!" Meg yelled, pointing a finger at you in warning.

You turned and started to walk away. "Oh yeah? Who's going to stop me?"

Megan lunged.

You fell hard to the ground, conking your head. "Ouch! Megan, what the fuck?" You managed to turn yourself over, but now she was sitting on your chest. Her whole gelatinous form was on display, and from below her little paunch looked massive. You could even see that the fat was going to her breasts. "Meg, seriously." you choked, it was getting hard to breathe. "Get off me!" You attempted to push her off but she was feeling really heavy.

Meg scooted forward, closer to your face. "Well, it looks like I stopped you. And now I'm free to do whatever I want."

"Megan!" You coughed, looking around as your face started to go pink. You grabbed at her thighs but they would not move. "Let me up! Megan!"

"Sorry Justin~" she teased, giggling and biting her lip. She was starting to get the same feeling of arousal that she had at McDonalds. She scooted closer to your face, so that now her crotch was on your chin and her belly enveloped your mouth.

"Meg..." you gurgled, breathing difficult.

Her breaths quickened. You flailed, and then fell limp.

Megan wiped her brow. God, was it hot in here or what?

Just then Lauren walked in and nearly had a heart attack.

"Told you I would deal with Justin." She grinned devilishly.

======================================================================

The next time you awoke, it was dark in the hallway.
13111112112112112211221121.title: The Hallway confrontation.

choices: Lauren shows up, looking for her little lost pig.
Kylie invites Megan to compete in another eating contest.
131111121121121122112211211.content:
Your eyes snap open violently, residual panic quickly dissipating as you realize you're no longer trapped under your little sister's flab. You sit up slowly in the dark hallway, still mentally and physically disoriented from being forcibly drowned by Megan's fat body. Your eyes pan around the hallway, looking for any sign of the tubby teenager.

"Where is that gluttonous little braceface?" You say to yourself. Your eyes lock onto the door of Megan's room, slightly ajar with a soft light coming from inside. You stand up carefully, shaking your head slightly as you try to rid your mind's eye of the image of Megan's belly flooding over your mouth and nose. You blink a couple times to refocus yourself, and then stumble over to the door.

"Meg..." You begin, "I want to talk to you about earlier," You pull the door open, expecting to see Megan reclining on her bed, most likely gorging herself. Instead, you see an empty room. Drawers are thrown open, a few articles of clothing are spread across the floor, along with countless fast food wrappers and junk food garbage. "Looks like Meg had a real tantrum..." You mumble, rubbing your head as you survey the scene. You pick up an empty package of cookies, and turn it over. Not even a crumb falls out. "Tantrum and binge, that is," You correct yourself. You turn slightly to throw the trash into the can, and stop when you realize a pattern. As dread begins to come over you, your eyes dart around the room looking for one thing, the one thing that would make everything okay, that if it's missing, you have a big problem on your hands. "No backpack," You say, breathlessly, "This wasn't a tantrum. She was packing." You make your way through the piles of wrappers and trash to seat yourself on Megan's bed, surveying the damage. You let out a slow breath, and eventually you say one thing.

"What am I going to tell Mom?"

------------------------------

Somewhere, not too far away, Megan was walking down the dark streets alone. Her face was red, both from anger and the fact that walking very far wasn't an everyday occurrence for her. She huffed and puffed loudly, trying to get her breath back as she waddled along, her thick rolls of lard bouncing visibly under her skin-tight spandex clothes. Her huge thighs rubbed against each other and her wide hips quivered back and forth as she walked with passion. Slung over her plump shoulder was her backpack, crammed to bursting with the bare essentials: a change of her spandex garments, the only clothes that fit her anymore, her remaining cans of lard, and as much fattening junk food as she could fit. In her hand she held one of her cans of lard, open and half empty.

"Stupid Justin..." She mumbled to herself, pausing just long enough to tilt the can so that some of the pure fat could slide down her throat, "He doesn't know anything. Why can't he just see that this is who I am?" She takes another gulp of lard, moaning a bit as she feels the grease in her mouth, reveling in the pleasure of gluttony.

After a while of waddling, Megan comes to a small shopping area, and sees a food stand bathed in the mini-malls artificial light, as if it were a sign from the god of gluttony. A few folks mill around the stand in a small line, or seated on picnic tables nearby. Meg watches a couple walk away from the stand carrying big scoops of ice cream in plastic bowls. A small amount of drool starts to collect in the corner of her mouth. "Mmm... Ice cream," she says, dreamily. Answering to the siren call of food, she waddles towards the stand.

Megan waits impatiently in the line for some time, every so often moving slightly to the side to see if how close she is to the front. Eventually, she was next, and staring at a willowy goth girl behind the counter. "Can I help you?" She drones.

Megan licks her lips as she looks at all the sweet treats for sale. "Yeah, uh... What's the biggest size of milkshake you have?"

The grim cashier looked down at the obese teen. She was still slightly out of breath and sweaty from her "long" waddle over here, and she had a hungry look in her eyes, desperate to fill herself up with calories. The goth rolled her eyes, this girl was childhood obesity incarnate. "We have small, medium, large, and jumbo, Miss," She says, knowing which one this heifer wants.

"I'll take a jumbo chocolate shake!" Megan says, almost jumping for joy, hurriedly grabbing some money from the confines of her pack and shoving it towards the twenty-something. "Do... do you think you could put it in an old ice cream bucket?" Meg asks, as innocently as she can.

"What?" The cashier says, arcing a black eyebrow.

Meg grins as wide as she can, showing the cashier a mouthful of metal. "You know, an ice cream thing? The gallon buckets."

---------------------------------

A few of the patrons gave Megan odd looks as she heaved the half-full bucket of milkshake over to a picnic table. She gripped the bucket tight against her body, pressing into her fatty midriff and swelling breasts. A couple girls snickered to each other as she haphazardly lifted herself up onto the seat, giving everybody a good view of her huge, flabby thighs and the spandex shorts straining to contain the fat girl.

"Jeez," a pig-tailed girl said to her friend, "She's going to be a real whale by the time she's done with high school."

"Screw that," Her friend giggled, "She's going to be too fat to leave the house before then."

The two girls continued their walk away, laughing. They thought they were talking quiet enough to avoid Megan's ears, but they were wrong. Megan grinned to herself as the gossipy girls walked away. "Maybe I'm getting fat," Meg thought to herself, "But I'm having fun! I love to eat, and this is what I want to do." She silently considered being so fat she couldn't fit through doors for a second, before turning her attention back to her milkshake, but not before the thought lodged somewhere in the back of her mind.

Megan took her nearly empty can of lard and dumped the rest of the fat into the bucket with her milkshake, mixing vigorously. When she was sure it was mixed in well, she got another can out of her backpack, and began pouring that in as well. She stopped when the can was about half-empty, and the milkshake had become a thick, discolored grease shake, absolutely jammed full of calories and fat. Megan chuckled at her creation, as she popped the can closed again, putting back in her backpack for safe keeping. She took a large, greedy spoonful of the thick concoction and put it in her mouth, letting it melt. Immediately, the little plumper was in absolute heaven. It was sweet and greasy in equal measure, and would make a nutritionist explode at thirty paces from the sheer amount of calories in it. "Delicious..." Megan moaned.

Her pleasure was interrupted quickly, though, by a bright, clear voice calling her name. "Well, if it isn't Megan "The Stomach" McCoy?"

Megan, still putting another spoonful of her shake in her mouth, slowly turned to see where the voice was coming from. Walking toward her was a familiar chubby Korean girl dressed in a hoodie.

"You're the Eating Machine!" Megan said, still slightly distracted by the delicious treat she'd created.

The girl chuckled, and took a seat at the table. "I thought I told you to call me Kylie, remember?" She said, smiling, "And I thought you were going to quit doing eating contests! Sure didn't look like you did." Kylie jokingly prodded Megan's burgeoning stomach.

Meg defensively pulled down her spandex top, only to have it snap back up, keeping her roll of stomach fat hanging out in the open. "I'm a little surprised you remember me, actually," She said, quietly, "I mean, I lost and everything..."

Kylie shrugged. "So? I used to lose all the time too. Besides, I get people coming up to me all the time boasting about how they're going to beat me. But they all do it for the wrong reasons."

"What do you mean?" Meg said, squinting at her rival, trying to figure her out.

"Well, they all just did it because they wanted to win something, you know?" Kylie said, casually, dipping a finger into Megan's lard-shake. She popped the glob of ice cream into her mouth, letting it melt. "Mmm! That's good stuff!"

"Hey!" Megan said, sliding the bucket away from Kylie.

Kylie just chuckled. "See?" she said, "You didn't compete just because you wanted to win something. You competed because you love to eat." That comment made Megan smile her big, metal smile. "That's what matters, right?"

"Yeah," Megan said, smiling and staring down into her ice cream, "I guess it does."
131111121121121122112211211.title: On the Lamb

choices: Kylie trains Megan... but she has an ulterior motive?
Later that week, it's competition time!
1311111211211211221122112112.content:
Kylie pats Meg on the back and gets an enormous, genuine grin on her face. "Well, hey, if you're not out of retirement after all, want to come to the Springville hot dog eating invitational later this week? You can be on my team!"

Meg took a big gulp of her grease abomination and wiped her mouth clean. "It's a team competition?"

Kylie pulled out a chair from the table and sat down next to Meg. "Uh, yeah! And team Gut Busters is looking for a new member ever since Dave got his stomach ulcer and gave up the craft."

Meg mournfully spooned her milkshake in her mouth. "That does sound fun..."

"Well then, what's the matter?"

"My big bro. He'll tan my hide if I don't cut out the eating competitions."

"Your brother? Well, you can't live your life letting your choices get dictated by your brother!" Kylie pounded her fist on the table. "Tell you what, the invitational is in a few days. Why don't you come stay with me and I'll make sure you get there."

"You mean it?" Meg's face lit up.

"I mean it."

=======================================================

Frantically, you ran into Lauren's room. You found the older of your two sisters sitting on her bed, biting her nails and looking at her phone.

"Where's Meg?!" You ask loudly, staring Lauren down.

"I-"

"You what? Where is she?!"

"I-" Lauren sighed in defeat. "I don't know. She left and she won't answer my calls."

A pit of dread grew in your stomach, and it felt like someone poured icy water down your back. Meg ran away from home and she won't answer her phone. She could be kidnapped, or raped, or dead. The number of possibilities flashed through your mind rapid-fire.

"Come on. Get in my car. We're going to go look for Megan." You grabbed Lauren by the arm and yanked her off the bed.

The two of you drove around for a while, stopping at places you thought it would be likely to find your sister. You asked around at the burger joint, the local fair, the pizza parlor. Finally, you decided to ask the ice cream place.

The goth girl looks exasperated. "Yeah, I think I know her. She came by and ordered an extra large milkshake in a gallon tub."

You and Lauren shared a knowing glance.

"Definitely Megan."

"I dunno, she left here a while ago with a friend."

Exhausted, you and Lauren took a seat on the curb. For a while you just sat and thought about things. Finally you spoke.

"Well, if she's with a friend, at least she isn't dead."

"Very true." Lauren replied, trying not to admit that deep down inside she felt guilty for all of this.

"Meg will call us when she wants to come home. She can't stay away forever. Let's hold off on filing a police report, so we don't have to get mom involved."

"Dammit, Meg." Lauren sighed. "...please come home."

=======================================================

Meg rode shotgun on the way back to Kylie's apartment, slurping down large amounts of her lard-shake as she went. The girl had no shame. Her midriff hung loose and she couldn't help but occasionally burp as more and more of the concoction disappeared into her gullet. Kylie was unable to stop herself from taking passing glances.

They arrived at the parking complex and Meg drained the last of the bucket, tossing the remains into a nearby garbage bin. She hefted up her backpack to get a better grip and followed Kylie inside.

"This is it!" Said the eating machine. "Home, sweet, home." She waved her hands in a grandiose manner around the small apartment. "Make yourself comfortable."

"Thanks!" Meg said, strolling over to the couch and taking a seat. She unzipped her backpack and started pulling out junk food by the fistful, opening up a candy bar and taking a huge bite.

Kylie was shocked. This girl had just downed a gallon shake and was still on the prowl for more sweets? "Uh, Meg, I have real food if you want some. Like I can make us some spaghetti or a salad."

Megan nearly choked on her candy. "A salad?! Okay, mom. I like food with flavor." She took another bite.

Kylie was struck. She was in love. Slowly, she walked over and took a seat next to Meg. She reached a hand out towards her stomach. "Uh, may I? From one pro to another, of course."

Meg shrugged and pulled up her spandex shirt, revealing the soft contour of her growing belly. Kylie began to rub it as Meg continued her eating.

"You know, Meg, you definitely have the gluttony aspect of competitive eating down. But you know what you need?"

Meg made an inquisitive noise with a mouth full of candy.

"Training."
1311111211211211221122112112.title: Kylie invites Meg to another contest.

choices: The next day, Megan's training begins properly, and boy is she hungry!
In the night, Megan sneaks more of the pills. More is better, right?
13111112112112112211221121121.content:
"So!" Kylie said with a grin, prodding Meg in her jelly-like stomach, "So we know you can eat a lot, and that's fine. But that's not enough to win an eating contest."

Megan briefly looked up from her candy gorge. "It'sh not?" She said, spitting a few flecks of chocolate from her calorie packed mouth.

Kylie stood up and pulled her phone from her hoodie pocket. "It's not. There are a lot of people who love to eat, but not all of them are eating contest champions, right?" She quickly tapped out a few numbers on the phone and held it up to her ear. "You need to really understand the way an eating contest works. Tailor yourself for it. We have to get ready, just like any other athlete does."

Megan heard a click and a voice on the other side of Kylie's line, too quiet to make out specific words. "Who are you calling?" She asked.

Kylie grinned again, holding her hand over the bottom of her phone so the other person wouldn't hear. She returned to her conversation. "Lee! It's me..." Some chattering on the other side. "That's all fine, whatever. Listen, I found a replacement for Dave," Some more chatter, sounding somewhat skeptical. "Yes, yes, I'm sure. She just needs a little training. Yeah... Get on over here as soon as you can. And bring your fatass of a sister along, Megan should meet her other teammate. See ya soon." She slipped her phone back into her pocket. "They'll be over in a bit. As soon as Lee can wake up her sister, that is."

Megan couldn't help but smile, showing her chocolate coated braces, and bunching her chin fat up noticably, "You're really going to train me, huh?"

"Of course," Kylie said, with confidence, "But we can't start until those two get here. So, until then, want something to eat?"

Megan's eyes brightened. "No salads, right?" Megan said, hopefully.

"No salads, I promise."

She shoved another candy bar into her mouth, continuing to try to fill her apparently bottomless stomach. "Then yesh!"

Kylie chuckled, walking into the kitchen. She opened a few cupboards, looking at the various boxes of treats inside. "Hungry for anything in..." She began, before her eyes focused on a large plastic tub. The tub was an off white color, and completely unmarked, but she knew what was inside. "...particular," she finished quietly.

"Anything's fine!" Megan called, audibly continuing her binge in the other room.

"How about... Uh..." Kylie swung around, grabbing a bowl from inside the fridge, and putting it on the counter. She peeled the plastic wrap back, letting the sugary smell of the chocolatey goo on the inside fill the room. "How about some pudding. You like pudding, right?"

Kylie hear Megan scoff from the other room. "Are there people who DON'T like pudding?" The gluttonous teen said.

Kylie pulled the unlabeled tub down from the shelf, popping it open as quietly as she could. "I don't think so," she called back, as she took up the plastic spoon on the inside, taking a heaping spoonful of the odd white powder on the inside, and ladeling it into a large bowl. She took a couple large spoonfuls of pudding and added it to the bowl, stirring vigorously until the evidence of the powder was completely gone. Kylie stared down into the bowl of sugary and creamy goodness, thinking of the growing chubster sitting in the other room. Her fatty muffin top pressing over the top of her waistband, jiggling as she stuffed her gluttonous fa-

Kylie shook her head, bringing her back to reality. She sighed, and put another heaping spoonful of powder into the pudding, and quickly stirred it away. She capped the tub of powder and put it back up on the shelf. Walking back into the living room, she passed the large serving bowl to the overweight girl she found now under her wing.

"Mmm!" Megan said as she looked down into the pudding, just a bit of pleasure away from being a full-on moan, "This looks amazing!"

Kylie smiled, trying to focus on training this hopeful champion, "I'm glad you like it!"

Megan dug into the pudding with gusto, the noises she made clearly showing she was enjoying herself. Kylie looked on to the glutton with mixed feelings. "This is going to be hard to keep professional," Kylie thought to herself.

-----------

"Stop jumping up and down."

"I can't help it, I'm just so excited! Aren't you?"

"No?"

"Well, that's because you're just a jerk. Knock on the door!"

Silently, the woman knocks on the door, with two quick raps. After a second, the door of the apartment swings open to reveal an obese teen on the other side, flab hanging out of every possible area.

"Who the hell are you?" The first woman says. She's a grim faced woman with strawberry blonde hair, cropped into a clean pixie cut. She's tall and slim, her professional yet stylish clothes hanging fairly loose on her.

"Ooooh, you must be Megan!" The other woman says. She may have the same color hair as the first, but that's where the similarities end. Her strawberry blonde hair is long and flowing, her face rosy and cheerful. Her clothes are fairly casual, an oversized t-shirt and jeans. The shirt falls loosely over her body, but the jeans are creakingly tight. She's as tall as the other, but much, much heavier, approaching 400 pounds. She lunges at Megan, wrapping her two pillowy arms around the pudgy teen in a soft, warm bear hug.

Megan chuckles as she feels the girl's flab wrap around her. "You must be the girls Kylie called over here for my training, huh?"

From inside the apartment Kylie's voice rings out. "Are they here?" She calls, and soon comes sauntering toward the door. "There you two are!" She says, "Took you long enough to get here!"

"Sorry," the thin one says, shrugging, "We had to stop to get a snack for 'somebody'"

"Hey!" the fat one says, turning to glare at the other, "I had just woken up, I get hungry when I sleep, okay?"

The thin one walks up to Megan, bending down to look her in the eye. "Young little thing," she says to no one in particular, "But already pretty plump. How old are you, girl?"

Megan pulls back a little, eyeing the stranger critically. "You're not gonna eat me or anything, are you?"

Kylie laughs, ruffling Megan's hair. "The only one you need to worry about eating you is this one," she says, poking the fat one in the stomach. Kylie turns to Megan and smiles. "Megan, meet your other teammate, Jennifer."

"Hi!" The fat one says, waving energetically, her arm flab shaking as she does.

"And your trainer," Kylie continues, gesturing to the other, "This is Lee."

"Are you sure she's up to this?" Lee says, eyeing Megan up and down.

"Yes," Kylie says, with absolute confidence, "She's a natural born glutton. Just a little push and she could be great."

Lee shrugs. "Fine. Let's get started. I assume you'll let us stay over while she trains." Both Lee and Jennifer begin to walk into the living room.

"Of course," Kylie says, walking with them, and gesturing for Megan to follow, "I'll need you to oversee this."

Lee points at her sister, "Jen. Tell Megan about the different steps while I get the first part ready."

"Oooh!" Jennifer coos, "I love this part!" She clears her throat, and straightens the posture of her blubbery body into a more business like stance. "In order to get you prepared as a competitive eater, there are a couple steps you have to go through! They really help, trust me!" She slaps her stomach for emphasis, making it jiggling wildly, "The first step is to become one with your stomach!"

"What does that mean?" Megan says, frowning, "I already know when I want to eat."

"Ah!" Jennifer says, her eyes twinkling, "Anyone can know when to eat! But when you're a competitive eater, that's not good enough. You need to know what you're stomach is like!"

At this, Megan just arcs an eyebrow and turns to Kylie. Kylie laughs. "They know what they're talking about," she says, "Trust me."

"So!" Jennifer continues, "You need to know what your stomach wants, how much you can handle, and know how much you're holding right now! They're all important."

"And that," Lee says, turning around from whatever she was doing while Megan was turned away, "Is what this is for." Lee hands Megan a large pill, colored a pale green, looking like a vitamin supplement. "It's my secret blend of herbs and spices. It increases hunger, and amplifies cravings. If you'd normally be hungry, you're going to be starving. If you'd normally want ice cream, you're going to NEED ice cream. It also slows down the fullness impulse. So, you won't feel that full until you're pushed to the absolute limit. This is how you'll figure your stomach out."

Megan takes the pill and rolls it around in her hand slightly.

"Take one of these a day," Lee finishes.

"Can't I take a bunch at once, and get it over with?"

"No!" Lee says, sternly. "One a day, maximum."

Megan turns to Kylie, "Go get a glass of water and take that," Kylie says, "And then hit the sack. It's late, and you've got training tomorrow. Good night, champ."

Megan looks down at the pill and grins, as she imagines herself stuffing her face like never before. "Good night, everyone!" She says, before rushing off to the kitchen to take her first step towards glory.
13111112112112112211221121121.title: Eye of the Tiger, Stomach of the Hippo

choices: Eating Competition Boot Camp: Day Two.
That night, Meg catches Kylie putting the powder in her food. What's up?
131111121121121122112211211211.content:
Megan awoke the next morning to an intense pain in her stomach. Quickly she sat up, clutching her flabby gut. A cold sweat spread across her body - what could it be? A loud gurgle came from inside of her belly. It was then that she realized that she wasn't dying after all. She was hungry, the hungriest she'd ever felt in her life!

Meg started to stand up, but felt woozy almost immediately and fell back onto the couch with a whimper. "Kylie!" She yelled, holding herself.

Kylie ran into the main room, wearing only a robe. "Meg? You okay?"

"I'm so fucking hungry." Meg panted. "I feel like I'm going to die."

"That's the pills for you. They're serious business." Kylie said softly, brushing Meg's hair with her fingers.

"Can I have some breakfast?"

"I don't know, Meg." Kylie hesitated. "Today is supposed to be a training da-"

"Please!" Interrupted Megan, tears in her eyes, gripping Kylie's robe with one fist. "It hurts!"

Kylie couldn't stand to see Meg cry like that. "Okay, I'll make you up something little. Don't tell Lee."

"I won't." Meg said, relaxing back down onto the couch.

Kylie went to her kitchen and fixed up some more chocolate pudding, not forgetting to mix some of the white powder in before she handed it to her waiting glutton. Megan devoured it ravenously, not caring about anything except quelling the sensation inside her stomach. She tilted the bowl of pudding back and drank it, leaving little marks of chocolate on the sides of her mouth. Then she licked the bowl clean and handed it back to Kylie, the painful sensation finally dulled.

=======================================

"The first lesson I will be teaching you is about capacity. Do you know your capacity?" Lee asked, standing in front of Kylie and Meg on the couch. She was holding a riding crop in her hand, and she pointed it now at Megan.

"Um, once I ate 24 burgers in an eating competition?" Meg said.

"Inconclusive. There are many factors you're not controlling for." Snapped Lee, smacking Meg's belly with the crop.

"Ooh! Ooh! I know, teach!" Kylie yelled, raising her hand.

"You, Kylie." Said Lee, pointing the crop at her.

"5.24 Liters at last measure, ma'am." Obviously Kylie was enjoying hamming it up. This was all an act, she and Lee had known each other since high school.

"Very good!" Grinned Lee. "Megan, you will learn to know your capacity, and once you do you can learn to expand it. If you want to compete in the invitational this week, we must try and expand your capacity as much as possible."

"How do I know my capacity?" Asked Meg, raising her hand.

"I'm glad you asked. Kylie, get the ice cream!"

She did as told, going to the kitchen to grab a liter tub out of the fridge. But not before tossing some powder over the top. She brought the tub back to Megan.

"Eat as many of these as you can. When you literally cannot force yourself to swallow another bite, we will know your capacity."

Meg cheered. Her hungry stomach demanded food, and some ice cream really seemed like it would hit the spot. The girl dove in, gobbling down spoonful after spoonful of the dessert as fast as she could. The creamy treat went down easy, and it only seemed to fuel her ravenous desire for food more. Was it the pills?

"Let's go, Megan!" Kylie cheered, eagerly watching her new teammate.

The first two liters were nothing for the young glutton, Meg made short work of the two tubs. But she was halfway through her third and she was starting to slow down. Huffing, puffing, groaning and burping, she pushed forward.

"You can do it, Meg!" Kylie said. Lee was looking impatiently at a stopwatch.

A few minutes later, they had their measure.

"3.33 Liters." Lee said, curtly. "It's good, sure. But not competition good. Megan looked a bit crestfallen.

"Lighten up, Lee!" Kylie nagged, with a punch on the arm. "Pretty good for a first try."

Lee rubbed her arm and scowled. "Still. The competition is at the end of this week. We'll have to work overtime."

Meg could barely pay attention. She simply lay on the couch rubbing her distended belly, which was making a whole host of groaning and churning noises. Her ice-cream addled brain couldn't make heads or tails of it all. All she knew was fullness.

"I'm going out to get some supplies." Said Lee as she threw on her coat. "We've got work to do."
131111121121121122112211211211.title: Training: Day One.

choices: Pancakes? Count me in!
1311111211211211221122112112111.content:
If you'd have asked Megan how long she sat on that couch getting stuffed by Kylie and Lee, she wouldn't have been able to tell you. The entire day passed in a haze of gluttony, slipping in and out of food comas, being vaguely aware that her two coaches were filling her up to the absolute maximum to make sure she was in fighting shape for the competition. The last thing she remembered was Kylie handing her a pill and a glass of water, saying something garbled that had the words "Good" "Today" "Kid" and "Work" in it. And then she hit the pillows of the couch harder than she ever had before.

-----

"My Queen, are you doing all right? You seem... distracted."

Kylie looked up. "Hm?" she said, shaking her head a little, "I'm fine, fine."

"I'm glad to hear it," Kylie said. She was dressed in a long, flowing red robe, something much more stylish than Megan had ever seen her in, but for some reason it didn't bother her. "Shall we continue dinner?" Kylie motioned toward Megan with an ornate golden pitcher. A delicious sugary smell flowed out and filled the room like molten glass.

"Yes, I should think so," Megan said. Inwardly, Megan frowned. "I don't talk like that..." She thought to herself. With some difficulty, she turned her head, looking around the room. It was a large, ornate space full of marble, columns, and tapestries, exactly like an ancient palace. "Oh, right..." she thought to herself, "This is my throne room." She tried her best to stand up, but she refused to budge. She heard Kylie chuckle.

"My Queen, what are you doing? You haven't been able to stand in years!" Kylie said.

Megan strained to look down at herself. But she couldn't see much. The bottom of her field of vision was completely taken up by her rolls upon rolls of creamy lard. Her three thick chins bunched up as she inspected her girth. Her huge, pillowy arms were uselessly heavy, taking all of her strength to lift them even slightly. Her ocean of a belly cascaded downward, completely hiding her no doubt massive legs under pound after pound of fat. Her overstuffed hands gripped one of her many rolls, and Megan's chubby cheeks turned into a smile. "That's right, Kylie. Forgive me. Let's continue with dinner."

Kylie made her way over to Megan, who opened her mouth, readying herself for her continued gorge. Kylie tilted the pitcher above her massive queen's awaiting maw, and gallons of pudding flowed.

Megan simply swallowed, and grew. And kept growing.

Swimming in fat.

Drowning. She tried to draw in a breath, but no air came into her lungs. Definitely drowning.

-----

With flailing limbs, and a deep breath, Megan flew awake. She sputtered and tried to sit up, hitting her head on something soft and warm. Whatever she hit moved back, to reveal she was standing in the wide shadow, and looking at the smiling face of Jennifer. "Good morning!" Jennifer said, quietly.

Megan grunted something that sounded almost like a greeting. Megan looked over at the huge woman standing over her, gripping the sides of her stomach with both hands. "Did you... wake me up...?"

Jennifer nodded. "If you're a REALLY heavy sleeper, sometimes the ol' nose-pinching trick doesn't really work. So I gave you the ol' belly attack, instead!" She gave her rolls a shake, chuckling. "It worked, didn't it?"

Megan just moaned in response, silently regretting the few times she had pulled the same trick, but for putting someone to sleep, instead. "Sorry, Justin..." She thought, but then her expression quickly soured as she remembered what she was doing here. She snapped up her phone from off the end table and looked at it. Quickly wiping away a long stream of notifications of missed calls, texts and other things from her frantic sister and brother, she looked at the time. "Jennifer," She said, calmly, "It's four in the morning."

Jennifer just nodded, energetically, "That's right!" she said.

Megan stared at her for a second, and then asked the obvious question. "Why are you waking me up at four in the morning?"

Jennifer grinned, and put a plump arm on Megan's shoulder. "Remember how you felt yesterday morning?" She asked, brightly.

A metal grimace pulled it's way across Megan's face. "Ugh," She said, spitting out the groan like it was Lauren's cabbage stew, "I wish I could forget. I don't think I've ever been so hungry in my entire life. It actually, physically hurt."

"Aaaaaaand?" Jennifer said, swaying back and forth a little, like a child trying to keep a party a secret, "And how do you feeeeeeeel?"

Megan put a hand on her growing roll of fat, and sat for a second of thought. Nothing. Not an ounce of the gnarling, clawing pain that tore through her the previous morning. "I actually... don't feel that bad!" Megan said.

"Riiiiight!" Jennifer said, "Yesterday, you waited too long before eating. When you're on the pills, you've got to keep yourself at least a little teensy bit full, so

you don't freak out like you did last time. So I'm getting you up early for a little breakfast, while your training is just finishing digesting! Come on, I'm making pancakes!"
1311111211211211221122112112111.title: Pictures and Cream: Part 1

choices: Megan handles Step two like a champion, and is ready for more!
Step two... doesn't go very well.
13111112112112112211221121121111.content:
It wasn't long afterword that both growing girls were sitting in the kitchen with a large stack of pancakes slathered in butter and syrup in front of them. Just as Megan was lifting her fork to dig in to her heavy breakfast, Jennifer reached over an lifted off a large portion of the stack with her fork, transferring it to her own plate. Megan glared at her like she'd been personally offended, "Those are mine!" She said, accusingly.

Jennifer just wagged her finger at the greedy teen before tearing off some of the pancake with her fork. "Ah, ah!" She said, "You can't eat THAT much for breakfast. Yesterday you found your limits, so today's the day that Lee pushes them for you."

Megan just shrugged, looking down at her puny stack of breakfast treats. "That makes sense, I guess..." She said, quietly, "Say, Jennifer, you really seem to know a lot about this training. Have you trained a lot of people?"

Jennifer chewed thoughtfully for a second, some syrup dripping out of the side of her mouth. "Not a lot," She said, after a second, "But I just remember it from when I did it."

Megan had started in on her pancakes, reveling in their sugary taste. "You went through training? I thought you just... were good already, I guess."

Jennifer just laughed, "I could eat a lot, sure, but nowhere as much as you!" The comment made Megan blush slightly. "And definitely not as much as Kylie. She actually was competition ready at the beginning. Me, not so much. Oooh! I just remembered, I have a picture!" Jennifer's whole blubbery form quaked for a second as she reached over to her purse, deftly zipping it open and taking out a ratty looking picture. She slid it over to Megan, careful not to put it down in any piles of syrup that had accidentally formed on the table.

Megan looked down at the photo, it's edges were rounded and soft from years of use. The extreme left of the picture was a distracting blob of darkness. Megan looked curiously up at Jennifer.

"Ahh..." She said, scratching the back of her head nervously, "That's just... The photographer had her finger over part of the lens."

Megan shrugged, and continued to look at the picture. It was four kids sitting on two park benches, at what seemed to be the entrance of a school. They were young, probably a little younger than Megan, even. The first person, Megan recognized immediately. She had the same amused look on her face, the same cut of her black hair, and the same lazy-day hoodie sense of style. Kylie, before she was a competitive eater. Next to her was an angry looking boy with a mat of brown hair, and bags under his eyes like he hadn't slept in days. He was looking annoyed, slightly turned toward the camera like he was about to say something. "Is this, uh..." Megan began.

"That's Dave, the guy you're replacing on the team," Jennifer confirmed.

On the next bench over sat a tall, thin boy in black slacks, a button up shirt, sunglasses, and a baseball hat. "Uhhh...Who's this boy?" Megan faltered.

"Oh, haha!" Jennifer said, "That's Lee. A little hard to tell, back then, I guess," She chuckled, "She hated people calling her a boy though, so don't tell her you thought that."

Megan looked down at the picture again. "Lee?" Megan said, confused, "But I thought Lee was..." She started to point to the fourth figure in the picture before she realized. The fourth person did, indeed, look a lot like Lee. Tall, thin, with strawberry blonde hair. But the smile on her face was unmistakable. "Oh!" Megan said.

Jennifer shrugged, "Yeah, I've put on a little weight since then, I guess. That was a little before we got into competitive eating. Kylie was an absolute natural, but I really had to work at it. Kylie really did her best to help me along though, all throughout school she helped push the limits of my appetite. I got bigger and better. But, that's how it goes when you're not a weird metabolism mutant like Kylie."

"Who's a mutant?" A voice said from the other room. From the living room walked a sleepy Kylie. "I was going to wake you up, but apparently somebody beat me to the punch."

Jennifer nodded. "Thought I'd give her a couple tips from an old pro so she can avoid that ache like last time! I know it really helped me out."

"Fair enough," Kylie said, walking over to the counter to make a pot of coffee, "You'll need all the help you can get today. Lee's moving you to step two."

Kylie turned and opened the fridge wide, revealing four bottles big bottles of an white, grainy looking liquid.

"Uhhh..." Megan said, a little hesitant, "What is that?"

"Step two, trainee!" Said the no-nonsense voice of Lee, "Today we're pumping you full of a special concoction." Lee leaned into the room, with a length of tube wrapped around her arm. "And I do mean pump."

"Uhh..." Megan said, beginning to rethink being a competitive eater for a brief second.

"Don't worry," Kylie said, reassuringly putting her hand on Megan's shoulder, "It's not as bad as she's making it seem."

"Yeah!" Jennifer said, through a full mouth, "Lee's mix is delicious! I would drink it all the time, I think, but it's kind of expensive to make."

"That's true," Lee said, "It's a sweet cream base, with a load of other stuff in it, to balance the taste and texture out, and more special herbs and spices. Not as strong as the pills; they relax your stomach so we can really push your limits and stuff you like a christmas turkey."

Megan closed her eyes hard for a second, imagining her goal. Winning an eating competition was nice, but what she really wanted was just to eat more. She opened her eyes, now focused and ready for the next trial. "Okay," She said firmly, "Let's go."
13111112112112112211221121121111.title: Pictures and Cream: Part 2

choices: Wakes up to find Kylie fondling her belly.
Hears on the radio that there's an Amber Alert out for her. Oops.
131111121121121122112211211211111.content:
"I don't want to seem uncommitted to the cause, guys. But, uh... are the straps really necessary?" Meg squeaked, as a belt was tightened around each of her arms.

"Quite necessary." barked Lee, putting together a combination of tube and mask for the pouring of the special liquid. "We don't need you changing your mind and trying to leave, and end up hurting yourself."

Meg gulped nervously. "Uhh... could that happen?"

Kylie smiled disarmingly, shaking up a jug of the white concoction. "No, of course not! You're not gonna give up, so there's no chance you'll hurt yourself!"

Lee slipped the mask over Meg's face, it strapped onto her mouth and shoved a tube in. "Now, there's no real way to converse with that thing on, so if there's trouble just scream and we'll hear your muffled yell."

Meg was starting to get a bit worried. She didn't want to let on, but all this talk was getting kind of scary.

"Now, we have four liters here." said Lee, gesturing to the bottles on the table. "Your goal today is to take them all. I know it's a bit of a step up from 3.3 liters, but the competition is coming soon and this has a relaxing agent in it. It will really help you stretch."

Jennifer attached the other end of the hose to one of the bottles on the table with a flabby arm. On the end of the hose was the pumping appendage. "I'll be doing the pumping!" She giggled.

"And I'll be taking notes." Lee said, with the click of a pen.

"I'm moral support." Kylie said with a smile.

Meg grunted.

"Well, if we're ready then," said Lee, "Jenn, start pumping!"

Jenn did as she was told, pumping the lever up and down. The thick white liquid snaked its way up the hose and into Meg's mouth. Soon it had hit her tongue... And wow, it was really good! Nice and sweet and a bit of spice. Kind of like eggnog, consistency too.

"Chug!" yelled Kylie, excitedly.

Meg had no choice but to do so, as the cream was coming in fast and her mouth was basically strapped shut. It felt nice going down, like it was coating her insides. As she chugged, she noticed her esophagus and stomach were getting a bit tingly... must be the relaxant. The first liter was pretty uneventful, as Megan was pretty used to consuming this much food basically every meal. To her surprise, so was the second! She could barely feel a thing even after the second had been entirely emptied into her gut. Whatever was in this mixture must be the key to this team's continued success.

"You're doing great, Meg!" Kylie said with a smile, patting her belly.

"Yes, but let's not dawdle. Jennifer, start her on the third liter." Lee said matter-of-factly, scribbling some numbers on her clipboard.

The third went down pretty well, but she was feeling really full now. Her stomach felt distended even though the feeling was dulled. The effort of chugging all that thick liquid was making her sweat. She felt like something in the mixture was making her sleepy. And now Jennifer was hooking up the final container.

"Just one more jug, then you're done."

Meg moaned.

As the pumping started, Meg realized she could actually feel her stomach expanding. Each gulp she was taking was stretching her out more and more. Her shirt was pressing tightly against her stomach and she could feel the fabric getting tighter. About halfway through, her stomach was begging her not to take another gulp. It felt like she had reached her limit. The sleeping agent in the cream was making her start to nod off.

Meg groaned loudly, letting her mouth fill up with the mixture rather than swallow.

"C'mon Meg, you're almost finished! Power through!" Kylie cheered.

The pressure built in her mouth until the point where the mixture had nowhere else to go - and it started to go down her throat even though she wasn't swallowing. Her sleepy eyes opened wide for a moment, panicked. She could feel the action of the pump stretching out her stomach, increasing her limits. But the cream was making it hard for her to keep her eyes open at the same time. Whether she liked it or not, these four liters were all going into her belly.

When she was done, the top part of her belly where her stomach was was extremely distended. She had already gone to sleep, her head fallen back in her chair. Her stomach was gurgling and churning trying to process all of what had just entered its walls. Lee scribbled a few more notes.

"Good work, ladies." She tucked the clipboard under her arm. "Meg shows promise. I expect her to be fully competition ready by the day of the competition."

"I knew she was good!" boasted Kylie, wanting her credit for getting her on the team.

"Same time tomorrow?" asked Jennifer, rubbing her flabby arms. All that pumping really was hard work.

"Sounds good. We'll have our comeback, after all." Lee said with a rarely-seen smile.


Later that night, Meg awoke in a cold sweat, still strapped to her chair. She...
131111121121121122112211211211111.title: Training Day Two: Cream Forcefeeding.

choices: This morning was a fluke - Meg manages to eat the whole pot and wins!
The stench proves too great. Megan can't finish all the soup, and loses the bet.
1311112.content:
Megan sat on the counter as you cooked, wincing a bit as the brussels sprouts dropped into the boiling broth. Cautiously, she leaned over, looking into the deepening green color of the foul mixture with abject horror. The stench was already beginning to fill the kitchen, and the soup was far from done.

"Come on Justin, you don't wanna eat this stuff any more than me! Let's order a pizza! I'm buying!" Megan pleaded, looking over at you with those watery sister eyes that so often persuaded you. However, this time you simply scoffed.

"Gee, I dunno, a bet's a bet, Meg!" you exclaimed gleefully, grinning as you sprinkled caraway seeds into the bubbling concoction. "And besides, who said anything about me? This is aaaaaaallllll for you, o deep-stomached sis."

Megan grabbed her stomach and a look of regret crossed her face as she remembered the events of earlier today. After finishing her entire jellybean breakfast pizza, she'd stupidly bet you that she could eat another six breakfast burritos on top of it. She'd come close - she recalled how her stomach had looked pregnant and ready to burst, but after the fifth burrito Meg simply could stuff no more. She'd been so full that she was unable to eat anything for lunch, and now she was understandably hungry. But she knew the only thing that she'd be eating tonight would be the brussels sprout and broccoli soup.

It was around this time that Lauren strolled into the room, clutching a magazine. "Wow, are my siblings really cooking a healthy meal? Am I in the Twilight Zone right now?" she called out, leaning over the pot, giving it a sniff. "Oh, ew, Mom's stew? I appreciate the effort on eating healthy, guys, but did you really have to pick the worst recipe?" Lauren said as she did a 180, heading for the fridge.

"Oh trust me," you called back, stirring the fetid mixture. "I'm not eating this garbage. It's Meg's punishment. She lost a bet."

Lauren let loose a shrieking laugh as she pulled some lettuce and veggies from the fridge, causing Megan's frown to deepen. "Well then, enjoy, Meg! I think I'll have a nice salad." Lauren teased as she left the room with her meal.

"...Fuck me, in the face of brussels sprouts and broccoli a salad actually sounds good." Meg said as Lauren left the room.

"You can have all the salad you want-" you said, turning the heat off, acquiring a devilish grin. "-once you've finished your soup."

Meg swallowed nervously. "Er- that's a big pot, Justin! You don't expect me to eat it all, right?"

Again, you scoffed. "That was the bet, wasn't it? Is this the same girl that was convinced that she had a bottomless stomach this morning?"

She looked down at the bubbling pot of thick stew. The pot was large enough to encase her head. The awful stench filled her nostrils. Meg retched. "Ulp- I mean, don't get me wrong, dude! I bet I could eat it all. I just really... REALLY don't wanna."

You pulled a large bowl and a ladle from the cupboard and started to serve up your sister's dinner. "Did I hear the word 'bet'? I'd have thought you learned your lesson after what happened this morning!" You said as you slid the bowl over to her, steam rising up from the warm soup inside.

Meg bit her lip as she stared down into the pea-green slop. She knew she'd have to face it one way or another, why not make it interesting?

"Come on Justin, at least let me make the best out of the situation! If I can finish all this... I get to pick what I want for dinner tomorrow. No questions."

You weighed your options. It was a pretty big pot. Probably not a large chance of success for your sister-sized garbage disposal.

"Alright, I guess so. And if I win... Um... I dunno, you have to keep me company when I go to the DMV later this week?"

Meg picked up her soup, looking at you, puzzled.

"That's all?"

"What, you want me to come up with something worse? It's a pretty boring place."

"I'll take those odds." Meg said, taking a deep breath and plugging her nose with two pinched fingers. "Cheers." She said, closed her eyes, and began to chug the bowl of soup.
1311112.title: Megan loses the bet.

choices: Yeah, let Megan have her way. It's her dinner night.
You try to stop her... But Meg is craftier than you think.
13111121.content:
The horrid concoction that your mother called "soup" was as thick as it was noxious, and it did not go down easy. And yet, Meg's competitive spirit would not let her turn away. Bowl after bowl she slurped down, her stomach beginning to bulge as she worked her way through the pot. It was actually quite impressive - no one had ever had seconds of mom's ol' brussels sprouts and broccoli, and here Megan was having fourths.

"Wow, Meg. I guess your hatred of losing is greater than your hatred of veggies." You quip, sitting down beside her with a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for yourself. No way were you touching that green goo.

"I'm just enduring this pain so I can eat what I want tomorrow night!" Meg replied nasally, her fingers still clasped around her nose.

An hour after she began, your little sister had polished off the whole batch. The evidence was clear: Her swollen belly poked out from under her shirt.

"God damn Meg, you really did it." You said, admiring the empty pot. "I thought you'd hurl after the first bowl."

"Nah, Justin. I'm real skilled when it comes to eating. I just lost that bet this morning because you psyched me out. This time, I didn't let you get into my head!"

"Uh-huh."

Meg patted her belly and moved upright in her chair, with an audible slosh. "I mean it, Justin! I can put anything I want to in here."

You rolled your eyes. "Well, anyway, you've won this little bet. Just tell me what you want to eat tomorrow and I'll make it."

"A-ha!" Meg yelled. "It's not what I want to eat, but where."

=================================================================

Around 7:00 the following night, the two of you pulled up to the restaurant Meg requested. It was about 30 minutes from your house, and you'd never heard of it before. It looked sketchy.

"I dunno, Meg. 'The Coronary Cafe'?" You said, reading the sign. "It sounds evil."

"Far from it, Justin! It's simply being honest. This food is really bad for you."

You looked over worriedly. "Then why are we here?"

"Because! I just ate so much of mom's health food, I'm too healthy. This will balance things out. Plus, I've always wanted to go!"

She seemed excited, and hey - a bet's a bet. The two of you exited your car and strolled inside. The cafe was loud and hot, and everything smelled like bubbling grease. The waitress was wearing a nurse costume.

"Hi, welcome to the Coronary Cafe! Two patients this evening?" The waitress asked.

"Uh, yeah, just the two of us."

"Great! Right this way!"

You leaned down to whisper to your sister as the two of you walked to your table. "Meg, I'm scared."

"God, don't be such a baby, Justin!" Meg said, with a light punch to your arm.

The waitress seated the two of you and went over their menu. "Now, we have the quarter pounder for $5, the half pounder for $7, the pounder for $10, and the double pounder with bacon and fries for $15, but if you finish it in an hour it's free!"

You didn't even have to look at Meg to know what she wanted.

Confidently, your little sister piped up "I'll have the double pounder and a large soda!"

"No, no, no you won't." You interjected. "You'll never finish that."

Meg grinned and let loose what seemed to be her two favorite words as of late. "Wanna bet?"

The waitress was waiting. Did you let your sister indulge?
13111121.title: A trip to the Coronary Cafe.

choices: She forces Megan to finish the opened box of cookies.
She forces you both to finish the opened box of cookies.
She grabs some of the snacks and storms off, swearing revenge
132.content:
Realizing that there's simply no way you'll be able to smuggle this smorgasbord of food into the house, let alone find a good place to hide it, you decide that it's best to just be open about it. Both Meg and yourself have long grown accustomed to Lauren's healthy rants so you figure that the two of you will be able to handle whatever venom she decides to throw your way. You are the master of the house, after all. If you want it to be filled to the brim with snacks, then so it shall!

Still, with that said, you empathize with your bustier sister somewhat. It wasn't your own health that you were really worried about though; it was Megan's. From a young age, Megan's always been a sort of glutton. No matter the meal, no matter the food, the young girl always seemed to be the first to empty her plate. The ride home is no different. Out of the corner of your eye, you watch as Megan shoves her greedy hand into the "family-sized" bag, pulling out fistfuls of the salty chips. She wastes no time in shoving the snacks into her waiting maw, devouring them so quickly that you are unsure if she had even chewed the damn things before swallowing.

You arrive home not long after that, the wheels of the car shrieking to a halt as the two of you pull into the driveway. As if on perfect cue, Megan gulps down the last chips at the same moment, carelessly tossing the silver aluminum bag into the seat behind her. Shocked at the speed in which she devoured the things, you are even more suprised as you see her hands reach back for an unopened box of cookies.

"Wait, what are you doing? You just ate a whole bag of chips!" you yell.

"Aww, come on Justin, can't I just have one cookie? I promise, just one!"

She leans forward, giving you those puppy-dog eyes. It disgusts you, but again, that desire to get big bro cred is too much.

"Fine, but just one, okay? And you have to help me move all this stuff into the house"

"Agreed. Thanks Justin!" she chimes as her hands rip the thin plastic cover of the cookie container. As promised, she gracefully pulls one cookie from the package and drops it in her mouth. Without a single chew, you watch as a thick lump makes its way from the top of her throat, disappearing at the upper point of her chest. You cock your head at the odd sight, unsure of how the girl's able to swallow it so efficiently.

---

Thanks to your and Megan's teamwork, it takes only a few minutes to empty the car of its delicious splendor. Nearly every inch of counter space and table top in the room is covered by some sort of junk-food, a testament to how overboard you and her had went. Though you are starting to regret the decision, it is quite obvious that Megan is not, her green eyes beaming as she walks the length of the kitchen, examining your horrifying haul. You consider returning some of it, and were even going to voice your concern to Megan, but your plan is interrupted when Lauren walks into the room.

"What the HELL did you guys do!?" she screams, examining the scene with a vastly different demeanor than Megan had. "None of this garbage was on the list!"

"Well, me and Justin decided to get a few extra things."

"A few? Are you kidding? You got more junk food than actual food here! What's wrong with you idiots?"

"Shut the hell up, health nut," Megan shoots back, "we got your crappy food too, so stop freaking."

"Whatever, no-cups, just remember, I'm making dinner tonight, so don't eat too much"

"Who said I'll eat that crap?" Megan says, "Not all of us are embarrassed of our pot belly, fatty."

A nerve struck, Lauren's face turns beet red in anger. You instinctively step back, knowing from experience that Lauren can do vicious things when pissed. What does the angry girl do?
132.title: Lauren's Confrontation

choices: "Sure, you finished the cookies, but what are cookies without milk?"
"Fine, just get this junk shit outta my sight."
1321.content:
"Listen, bitch. If I call mom and tell her what kind of shit you guys bought with the grocery money she gave to you, you'd be in so much trouble that you'd both wish you'd never been born. So, I'm going to make you regret your decision." She pushed the box of cookies across the counter to Megan. "Eat. All of them. Even after you're sick of cookies, it won't be enough."

You tried to interrupt. "Lauren, isn't this-"

"Don't you start, Justin! I'll call mom on your ass if you try and stop me!" you took another step backward. Megan looked at you helplessly, but you both knew there was nothing that could be done.

"Go on, you wanted your shitty junk food, now eat it." Lauren said, crossing her arms.

Megan gulped, and started to munch on the cookies.

One cookie down. Two cookies down. Man, they tasted delicious! As far as punishments go, this one didn't seem too bad. In fact, it seemed downright awesome! Meg started eating cookies two at a time. Four. Six. Eight. Easy.

You thought it looked as if your sister was enjoying her punishment, not detesting it. Lauren looked mad as ever. There were thirty cookies in the package, and Meg had already eaten more than a third of them.

The sweet, buttery, chocolatey cookies tasted great going down. Meg felt as if she wouldn't have any problem finishing them, even with the bag of chips already in her belly. Fourteen, Sixteen, Eighteen. This was easy! In fact, Megan felt like she just couldn't eat fast enough! The thought was funny to Meg, so she started laughing with her mouth full of crumbs. Lauren raised a quizzical eyebrow, but said nothing.

Twenty-two. Her mouth was a bit dry. Twenty-four. She felt a it full now. Twenty-six. Cookies didn't seem that appetizing anymore. Twenty-eight. One more. And... Twenty-nine.

Megan felt sick, but not overly so. She was definitely full, and her stomach gurgled and complained about the sudden influx in mass. Megan found herself wishing she could've eaten those cookies a little further apart.

"Well?" Lauren said. "Sorry?"

"Sorry for what, the fact that you can't take a joke? Haw." Meg said, rubbing her stomach.

Meg seemed all too pleased with this punishment.

Lauren said,
1321.title: Megan has a few dozen cookies.

choices: She wanted you to help fatten Meg.
She wanted you to become her exercise buddy.
13211.content:
"Sure, you finished the cookies, but what are cookies without milk?" Lauren taunted.

The color drained from Megan's face. Though she had been able to down the entire package of cookies, the experience had left her bloated belly feeling nauseous. What it needed now was some light rest and Pepto-Bismal, not a sickening torrent of milk. Still, even if the punishment didn't end with her bent over a toilet bowl, there was still the issue of the calories. Oh, the calories. Though not nearly as weight cautious as her pudgy sister, Meg had no desire to start packing on the pounds. An entire package of cookies was already quiet fattening; an addition of milk was surely to push her past the point of weight gain, assuming she hadn't already passed it.

"Please, Lauren, no more!" she begged. "My belly can't handle it."

"Aww, what's that? Is the human snack disposal starting to have second thoughts about buying all this junk food?"

Meg, realizing her spiteful sister would never give in, lowered her head in defeat. Lauren, savoring the moment for all it was worth, slowly strutted towards the fridge. A confident, victorious grin stretched across her face from ear to ear as she ripped the pearly white door open, causing the contents inside to shake violently. She gazed inside, her eager eyes quickly locking onto the gallon jug of whole milk.

"Ah, here we are," she said as she lifted it out, "One gallon of whole milk, fresh from the supermarket. Are you ready to see how much you can handle, flatty?"

Meg kept her head lowered, refusing to acknowledge her sister. Lauren, peeved at her sister's defiance, decided to be more forceful with the next round of feeding. Jug in hand, she stomped over to her sister and grabbed the back of her hair, forcing her face upwards. Meg screamed in pain, opening her mouth long enough for Lauren to shove the circular opening inside. Her eyes became wide as the first of the thick, creamy liquid flowed from the plastic container towards the back of her throat. She held back from swallowing, letting the milk build up and her cheeks to swell outwards, before finally giving in as the pressure became too much to bear.

From a distance, you observe as the skin around her throat is rhythmically expanded and contracted, working its hardest to send the milk into her waiting stomach. A look of pain grows in Megan's eyes as ever-flowing liquid begins to fill in the space between the chewed up cookies, adding greatly to the bloating burden she had felt. It's not until she's downed around half of the jug that her belly, literally packed entirely with milk and cookies, began to expand outwards, creating a small but visible bulge that presses against her shirt.

Lauren, content with the amount, stopped the milking at just passed the half-way point.

"That wasn't so bad, now was it?"

"Ugh...please, l-let me go lay down a bit Lauren."

"Sure thing, Meg. I think we've had enough junk food for today, wouldn't ya say?"

Had she been in a better state of mind, Meg would have shot back with clever insult, but she was barely able to walk, let alone be witty. She cautiously pulled herself out of the chair, her stuffed belly pushed outwards to keep balance as Lauren placed the half-finished milk back in the fridge. Worried about your sister, you decided to inquire on her condition.

"You sure you're alright, Meg?" you ask. "You look a little pained."

"Y-yeah, I'll be alright, I just need to lay down a bit..."

She trailed off as she exited the room. With the spectacle finished, you go to leave, but were stopped as Lauren grabbed you arm.

"And just where do you think you're going? We still haven't discussed you're punishment!"

What did she want you to do?
13211.title: Milky Torture

choices: Bring Meg a bunch of snack foods, tell her Lauren demanded she eat them.
Cook Meg a big dinner of her favorite things, making sure she cleans her plate.
132111.content:
"MY punishment?! Our parents left ME in charge!"

"Oh, but my dear brother Justin, if I call them, I'm sure they won't be very pleased with your actions." she said in a chiding tone.

You realized that she had you cornered.

"Fine... What's my punishment?"

"Well, your punishment is a bit more complicated, unfortunately. I want you to help me fatten up Meg."

"...What."

"This is the perfect opportunity. Our parents are gone, and Meg loves to eat! I might not have to be the fat one anymore!"

"I won't do it."

"Then I'll call up our parents on the phone and let them know what you spent their money on."

"So? I'll tell them you wanted me to fatten up my sister!"

"Is that really believable? You think they'll buy that?"

You hesistated.

"So, what happens when our parents get home and see fat Megan? We'll both be in trouble."

"I'll take the blame. I'll say she always wanted me to take her out to eat and I, being such a nice sister, couldn't help but oblige."

"You're evil."

"So, you game or what? I got mom on speed dial."

You weighed your options while Lauren's hand moved ever closer to the call button. Closer and closer. She pressed the button-

"Wait." Lauren paused. "I'll help."

"Yesssssss!" She put her phone away. "Thanks Justin, I always knew you were a cool guy."

Your gut wrenched itself in knots inside your chest.

Lauren started to walk away, but stopped. She turned around for one last comment.

"Oh, and Justin... If she hasn't gained at least five pounds in this coming week, Mom's getting a call. Got it?"

Your voice had been reduced to a whisper. "...got it."

Lauren walked away, whistling a happy tune.

You thought deeply about what you should do next. How were you supposed to convince your sister to pack on the pounds?
132111.title: A deal you can't refuse.

choices: You coax Megan to keep eating.  Just a little more!
Megan passes out, a victim of her own gluttony.
1321112.content:
That evening, you parked Megan in front of a monster movie marathon and proceeded to serve her a meal right out of her wildest dreams. Pizza. Hamburgers. Hot dogs. Chips by the bag. Mounds of coleslaw and simmering pots of baked beans. You didn't ask--you simply took the clean plates back to the kitchen and loaded them down again. With her appetite loosened by the likes of "Disco Dracula Goes to Paris" and "The Tingler" she didn't stand a chance. She was in hog heaven.

"So what's up?" she asked, as you set down another overflowing plate.

"Up?" you repeated innocently.

"Yeah, suddenly you're feeding me, like, crazy food. I mean, don't get me wrong, it's great, but--"

She eyed the plate. A sea of beans butted up against small dam built of grilled weiners, protecting greasy slice of pizza from getting flooded.

"It's just kind of a lot, you know? Especially after Lauren got all on my case earlier."

"Oh, well..." You searched for an explanation. "I felt bad about her being a superbitch to you. So I wanted to do something nice. You don't have to eat anything you don't want to."

"Good, 'cause I'm gettin' kind of full." She patted her stomach. She'd changed into a cute red T-shirt over a stripy long-sleeved top which fit her snugly enough that you could see that it was still pretty flat. Sure, she'd probably packed away enough food for three girls her age already, but you could tell she still had room.

You coughed. "Lauren actually pitched a fit when she say me picking up this stuff. She's still mad about what happened earlier."

"When she made me eat all those cookies? I'm the one would should be mad!"

"Yeah. She's pissed because you could. You know she worries about her weight, so it freaks her out when she sees someone like you who can eat anything and never gain a pound."

"Well, she didn't have to be so mean about it!"

"Hey, you want to teach her a lesson?" you say with a smile. "Really rub it in her face? You know what they say, eating well is the best revenge!"

"Yeah," Megan agreed, picking up the plate. "Yeah!"

You felt a little guilty about doing this. But right now, Lauren held all the cards. Besides, you weren't forcing Megan to eat, and what would it really hurt her to put on a few pounds? So she chubs up a little. Big whoop.

By the time the credits were rolling on "The Blob Who Ate Cleveland," Megan looked a little like she'd polished off a major metropolitan area herself. She was slouched on the couch, eyes heavy-lidded and stomach bulging with a mountain of fifth helpings and side dishes.

It was true that Megan rarely had to watch what she ate. But that's because she'd never eaten like this before.
1321112.title: Megan cleans her plate....s

choices: She was going to take Megan to a buffet, forcing her to eat as much as possible.
It was even more sinister than that. (Your choice.)
13211122.content:
You grinned as you placed the last slice of pizza and the last hot dog on the plate - that was all that was left! "One more plate, Meg! Although, I can make more if you're still hung-" you started to call out, only to go silent when you saw your sister. She'd passed out in a food-induced slumber, snoring and sprawled out on the couch so that her shirts had ridden up and her absolutely packed gut stuck out for all to see. You chuckled a bit, and your smile softened. You turned off the lights and turned around slowly, only to find Lauren standing in the hallway behind you. She had a shit-eating grin on her face.

"So?" she whispered, looking absolutely gleeful. You'd never seen Lauren this excited about anything. "How much has she eaten?"

"Jeez Lauren, calm down." you whispered back, with a twinge of guilt in your voice. "See for yourself, she's sleeping now."

Lauren peeked around the corner, Meg's pale belly a beacon in the dark room when illuminated by the television. Lauren immediately started snickering, turning back to you. "Oh my god, she's huge! It looks like she swallowed a bowling ball!"

"Yeah..." you bit your lip, clutching the plate. "I kinda feel bad about this, Lauren... I don't want to hurt her."

"Oh my god Justin, you're not backing out already are you? I can call-"

"No!" you interjected, looking panicked. "I- I'm not gonna give up. I just feel guilty."

"Well get over it, you dweeb." Lauren punched you lightly on the arm. "The little glutton looks like she's enjoying it."

A worried glance back in the living room confirmed this. Meg might've been stuffed stupid, but she had a wide grin on her sleeping face.

"I guess so."

"Right? So calm your tits, dude. Megan practically does your job for you."

This did little to calm the feeling of dread in your gut. "Sure... I just can't wait until this is over."

"Hey, think of it this way! The faster you fatten her, the quicker you can stop!" Lauren said with a smile that made you uneasy.

========================================================

The next morning, Meg was awoken by the scent of cinnamon and the sound of her grumbling stomach. "Ooooogh..." she moaned, rolling off the couch and onto the floor. The stuffing of last night had left its mark, though it wasn't much. Where her stomach had been completely flat before, it was now getting a bit less toned. The change was imperceptible to Megan, however, as she stumbled groggily into the kitchen. She plopped down into a seat at the kitchen table, putting her head down on her arms. "Oooooogh..." she moaned again, her mop of messy brown hair spilling over her arms and onto the table.

You pulled the tray of cinnamon rolls from the oven, intensifying the scent and causing your sister to look up from the table. "Hard night?" you asked, taking off your oven mitts.

"No, I slept like a baby, I'm just feeling hungry." Meg stood up groggily and looked over at the pan. "Cinnamon rolls? Have I died and gone to heaven? So much good food recently!" Meg exclaimed happily, resting a hand on her gurgling stomach.

"You're still alive, sis. I just thought that while the wicked bitch of the west is out of the house we should eat something that doesn't consist of lettuce and carrots, yeah?" you said as you spread icing on top of the rows of rolls. So far it seemed like Meg hadn't caught on to what Lauren was forcing you to do, but you couldn't be too sure.

"Yum!" the tiny black hole exclaimed as she pulled a hot gooey cinnamon roll from the pan and crammed it into her mouth. Hell, Lauren was right. You didn't need to force Meg to fatten herself up. As long as the food was there, she'd do it herself.

"Just make sure we don't leave any evidence! Lauren won't like this if she finds out!" you said with fake caution as Megan was already grabbing her second roll, knowing that the exact opposite was true. In fact, the reason that Lauren was gone for the moment was that she "had a plan for Meg" and she was out doing some kind of surely evil work.

"Our little secret." Meg says with a wink, before pulling another gooey, icing-coated roll from the pan.

It wasn't until later that day that you found out what Lauren's plan was.
13211122.title: Food Comas and Further Consorting.

choices: Hours later, Megan returns home, gorged and suffering from severe indigestion.
Megan turns the lie around.  "Shouldn't YOU be 'saving money' too?"
132111221.content:
It was early afternoon. You'd followed up the deluxe breakfast with a heavy lunch of spaghetti and garlic bread, which Megan had consumed just as eagerly. She was sprawled across the couch again, watching a Regular Show rerun with one hand resting on her slightly bloated middle, when Lauren came home.

"You've been feeding her, right?" she murmured to you, glancing into the living room.

"Yeah. She's pretty full," you say.

Lauren grinned and rubbed her hands together. "Per-fect!"

"What's perfect?"

"Nothing you need to worry about." She put one hand on your chest and pushed you out of the way playfully. "Ohhh, Meeee-gan!"

Megan struggled into a sitting position, brushing hair out of her face. "What?" she said nervously.

"I was just checking the money Mom and Dad left us, and it's lower than I expected. You wouldn't know anything about that, would you?"

Megan shook her head vigourously. "I didn't take it!"

"I'm not saying you stole it. Maybe you just...lost track of how much you've been eating."

"I...I don't think I..."

"How much have you had to eat today?"

Megan looked a little pale. She glanced your way, her eyes begging you for help.

"She's barely eaten anything," you said helpfully. "Just a little cereal and a sandwich for lunch."

"Poor thing!" Lauren said with feigned sympathy. "Now wonder you're lying around on the couch instead of doing something useful. You're weak from hunger!"

Megan nodded, buying it completely.

"Well. We'll just have to do something about that, won't we?" She jangled the car keys. "How about a little trip? Just us girls."

She shot you a warning glance before you could say anything. As she was dragging Meg out the door, your younger sister looked back, her eyes worried.

----

Megan sat in the passenger seat, uncomfortably aware of the pressure of the seatbelt against her full stomach.

"Where... where are we going?" she asked uneasily.

"We're gonna get you fed, silly!" Lauren laughed. "I can't have my little sister starving herself!"

Megan gulped.

"Isn't going out to eat kinda expensive?" she suggested. "I mean, if we're running low on money, maybe I should just make another sandwich at home or--"

"We're not just going out to eat. We're going to Jumbo Egg!" Lauren beamed as Megan's face fell. Jumbo Egg was the local buffet, mostly Chinese food but a little bit of everything, most of it deep fried. Until 5 P.M., it was all-you-can-eat for just seven dollars. "I figure if you really stuff yourself, if should last you all day. A pretty good deal, wouldn't you say?"

Megan shifted uneasily.

"I mean, it's not like you've eaten anything to speak of," Lauren prompted. "You must be absolutely ravenous by now, right?"

"Y-yeah," Megan said, leaning forward and trying to block her sister's view of her stomach with her. "I guess I could eat."

Lauren narrowed her eyes theatrically. "You guess you could eat? Are you sure you haven't been sneaking any snacks today?"

"I'm sure, I'm sure!"

"Good. Then you'll have no trouble getting our money's worth."

Megan's legs felt like gelatin as the two girls walked through the double doors of Jumbo Egg into a world of steam and rich, oily smells. Her previous meals sat in her belly like cement. How on Earth was she going to manage this?
132111221.title: She was going to take Megan to a buffet.

choices: You let Meg fatten herself. It's not your fault if she does it on her own!
You confront Lauren. You refuse to go forward with her plan.
1321112211.content:
The harsh fluorescents cast everything in a sick yellow light. Though a trip to Jumbo Egg would be a dream for Megan in any other context, it had become a complete nightmare. She stared down at her plate in a cold sweat, the pot stickers, lo mein, spring rolls, crab rangoon, all looking terribly unappetizing.

Lauren sat opposite Meg with a plate of salad, watching over her horror with gleeful malice. Megan picked up a spring roll as if she was about to eat, but set it down again and returned to staring at the food.

"What's wrong sis, aren't you hungry? I thought you were starving before we got here!"

"Oh, I am! It- um- all looks so good... that I can't decide what to eat first!" Meg chuckled in the fakest manner possible and put a pot sticker in her mouth, despite her complete lack of hunger. "Mmm... tasty!"

Lauren's awful grin twisted into a grinch-like sneer. "I knew you had to be hungry! Well, eat up Meg! We've got aaaallllll night."

=============================

The first plate wasn't so bad, Meg was used to eating beyond what was considered rational proportions.

Number two was pushing it, and once that was down Megan was feeling full.

However, by the end of the third, the girl was absolutely stuffed. Meg's stomach was almost round, and she had to unbutton her black jeans and rub her exposed gut with an empty hand. She couldn't suck in if she wanted to. This didn't stop Lauren from getting another plate for Meg, however, and soon she was facing plate number four, piled high with just as much fattening food as the previous three.

Meg let out a distressed burp and looked down at the food in anguish.

"What's wrong, Megan?" Lauren teased, not oblivious to her sister's plight. "Usually you eat way more than three plates when we come to Jumbo Egg..." She gasped, feigning worry. "You're not sick, are you? Or were you snacking after all?"

Meg closed her eyes and grimaced. "N-nope! Feeling fine!" Her stomach made an unearthly squelching noise as it tried to deal with the overload of meal. She grabbed a fork and started on plate number four, consciously willing her stomach to accept each new bite of food.

It was halfway through plate five that she decided she had to stop. Meg set her fork down and pushed her plate away, her stomach pink and throbbing. Its taut surface felt rock-hard, and she truly felt like she had filled every inch of her stomach. "I- I'm done Lauren! I got my money's worth! ...I can stop now..." she whined, rubbing her veritable basketball of a stomach with both hands, no longer caring who saw.
