Lauren pushed the plate back to her sister. "Nuh-uh! We are members of the clean plate club, missy! Finish this, and we can go."

Megan resisted breaking down right then and there, worked through the pain and picked the fork back up with a shaky hand...

=============================

It had been around four P.M. when Lauren had left with Meg, and it was seven-thirty now, and you still hadn't seen them. You were beginning to worry. Lauren could be quite the heartless bitch when she wanted to be, and you had no doubt that the past few hours had been nothing other than pure torture for your little sister. Just as you were about to call them, you heard the garage door open, making your heart skip a beat. You turned around to watch the door, Lauren being the only one to walk through it.

"Oh god, you killed her, didn't you!" You half-screamed, completely on edge.

Lauren simply giggled, deepening the feeling of dread you were having. "Of course not silly, I just stuffed her 'til it hurt! Our dear sister is sleeping in the car, having the biggest food coma known to mankind!"

"Lauren, it's one thing when she's stuffing herself, but now you're actively causing her pain!"

"Well, as long as you're fattening her fast enough, I won't have to intervene. But mark my words, Justin. You get more pounds with force than love."

You walked out to Lauren's car to check on your sister. You could hear low moans, even through the walls of the car. Popping open a door, you peeked inside.

"Meg? You okay?"

Another moan was your only response. You looked at your sister, and by god was she huge. "Basketball-esque" was the best word for it, in size and shape. It looked comical. You could hear the groans and churning noises of her hard-working belly.

"Dear god... what'd she do to you?"

"Ugh... Justin... So full..." Meg whined, punctuating her sentence with a burp.

"You look like 'The Blob Who Ate Cleveland'."

"I think eating Cleveland would've been easier than what I had to stomach." You could hear the pain in her voice.

"Can I do anything to help?"

"Carry me to bed."

"Oh Lord. If I can."

That got a weak chuckle out of her. "Well, let's try." She scooted forward out of the back seat where she lay, every movement causing her gut to groan in another way.

You slid one arm under your sister's legs at the knee, and supported her back with the other. In your arms, she looked so helpless, so innocent... and here you were fattening her up for Lauren's delights. But what other choice did you have? She was very hard to carry, but you managed. Her breathing was shallow and her stomach was gurgling all the way to her room. Covered in sweat, you finally deposited your sister in her bed, and a look of relief washed over her face.

"Thanks Justin... you're the best bro ever."

You chuckled, though your expression was pained. You couldn't help but feel like this was partially your fault. "I try. Goodnight Meg."

"Goodnight." The girl rolled over onto her side, cradling her stuffed belly.

You shut the door and tried not to feel too guilty.

The next day...
1321112211.title: Lauren's Evil Plot Unfolds at Jumbo Egg.

choices: You hang out with Megan, with no sign of Lauren, until dinner.
Lauren reappears, covered in crumbs, to enact her vengeance!
Despite suggesting she only eat the cookies before dinner, Megan snacks nonstop.
1323.content:
There was a tense moment as you watched both of your younger sisters stare each other down, just waiting for Lauren to blow and unleash one of her more potent moments of fury. Nothing came of it however, as the blonde eyed the counters lined with junk food, and gave a huff. Stomping past Megan, she snatched a box of Hostess Banana-Walnut Mini Muffins – Something you dimly recalled as being one of her many favorites before she got into the whole health-nut thing. Treats in hand, she turned her nose up at both you and Megan as she stomped out of the kitchen to stew. As well as plot and stuff her face with mini muffins, if you knew Lauren.

You let out a sigh of relief, as you were admittedly a little afraid of the older of your sisters sometimes. She could get... Borderline psychotic, really, when she got pissed. You'd think a health-nut would be into keeping their temper given what stress could do to a person, but then being logical would get in the way of the 'nut' part of that moniker. Your thoughts were interrupted as Megan turned to you with a triumphant grin on her face, metal braces glinting brightly from the overhead light. You shot her a smirk of your own, both to maintain your 'Cool Big-Bro' image and because well, Megan almost never 'won' when it came down to it. As much as all this stuff was pretty unhealthy, and as much as your little sister lacked self-control, it was nice to see her get her way for once. Besides, Mom and Dad would only be gone for three months – Spending that time giving Megan her chance to even the score, not to mention score some massive amounts of cool points yourself, couldn't hurt.

“Well, looks like the danger has passed for now. Help me put this stuff away, kiddo, then we'll decide what to do for dinner.”

You and Megan set about putting the various goods away. The frozen stuff was easy, as was the stuff to be kept in the fridge... Even if both had to be practically forced shut after a masterful display of organization skills honed from years of playing Tetris. The goods meant for the pantry, however, was a different story. There simply was not enough room, plain and simple, no matter how you arranged it. Megan frowned, hands on her wide hips, as she glanced between the packed-full pantry and the stack of junk food remaining on the counter. A glint appeared in her eye, and she scooped up the package of cookies off the counter. You recognized it as the same pack she had previously taken one from in the car, and she peeled the package open once more as she began to explain her idea.

“I'll finish off these cookies, then we can eat that big box of mac n cheese for dinner, then we can have that cake for desert!”

You eyed each as she listed them off, a contemplative frown on your face. That seemed like a lot of mac n cheese to eat in one go, even between the two of them. Particularly if Megan was going to fill up on cookies beforehand. Lauren wouldn't help out of principle and spite, and she certainly was unlikely to help eat the cake. Especially after having run off with those mini muffins earlier. Of course a cake would be fine to leave on the counter, since it had that plastic container it'd come in to keep it fresh. You just weren't sure what to do about the leftover mac n cheese, since there was literally no room left in the fridge for it. Well, whatever, you shrugged mentally and physically. You'd figure something out when the time came.

Taking the shrug as approval, Megan began popping the cookies into her mouth one by one as she wandered out of the kitchen. You couldn't help but smile at the bounce in her step, her simple enthusiastic glee banishing your concerns for now. You glanced a the clock mounted on the wall, noting that it'd be a few hours until it was time to start on dinner for you and your youngest sister.

Until then...
1323.title: The "Snackening" Begins

choices: Meg eats mac and cheese... After, Lauren reminds you she's making food tonight!
Megan cools down on the gluttony. But later, Lauren gets her promised revenge.
13233.content:
You were feeling pretty frazzled from Lauren's little confrontation, and you felt the need to just unwind. Plopping down on the couch, you quickly found something nice and brainless on TV to watch. It was some cheesy daytime sitcom with poor writing and a laugh track. Perfect. The occasional sound of canned laughter filled the room as you sank into the leather.

Unbeknownst to you, however, Megan was having a spree. When your mother was in town, it was lima beans for lunch, kale for dinner, bananas for breakfast. None of that applied anymore now that she had gone on vacation, Megan's gluttony had free reign. When she was forced to eat only vegetables it was easy to ignore just how much she truly ate; oftentimes she'd go back for thirds and still go to bed hungry.

That poor bag of Chips-Ahoy never stood a fighting chance.

Within the hour your sister had emptied out the entire package and she was already trekking back to the kitchen on the prowl for more.

The little glutton cracked open a family sized bag of Doritos with a satisfying crinkle, her hand quickly diving in to grab a large handful. For years the poor girl had been deprived of salts, sugars, and starches. Now? She was reveling in them. "Sooo good." Megan moaned, another cheesy handful finding its way to her ever-hungry maw. The rich flavor made her taste buds rejoice. Megan made her way back to her room carrying the bag, eating as she walked. Soon she'd be back again, empty-handed once more. This process repeated itself for the next few hours, with Meg every so often grabbing a package of snacks and bringing them back to her room to devour in one sitting.

The sitcom had taken you so completely that you hardly registered the comings and goings of your sister, and so when you got up to make dinner you got quite the nasty surprise. The huge pile of snacks had been reduced by half.

"What the..." You said, quietly, before yelling, "...Megan!"

"Yeeeeeees?!" came a yell from upstairs.

"Could you come here a minute, pretty please?"

Loud thumps descended the staircase, and into the room walked Meg with her hand in a bag of goldfish crackers. You swore it looked like her tummy was pushing out just a bit.

"Yeah?" She asked, oblivious, before shoving a handful of crackers into her mouth. You gestured at the small pile of snacks, then back at Megan, then back at the pile. She stared at you blankly.

You rolled your eyes. "What happened to the snacks?"

"Oh! Yeah, I ate them." She said matter-of-factly, putting another handful in her mouth. You were baffled. It seemed impossible for any one person to eat so much, especially someone with such a small figure as your sister. Slack-jawed, you watched Meg finish the remnants of the bag and crumple it up into a ball. "...so, are you ready to make dinner?"

"Meg, do you normally eat this much?" You asked, incredulous.

"Pssh, don't worry yourself, big bro." Meg licked her fingers. "I've just been starved since Mom and Dad left for Europe. I'll cool my jets after this."

Somehow you still felt uneasy.

"Alright, Meg. I'll make us up some mac and cheese. But then the jets will need to be cooled. Capisce?"

"Loud and clear!" She smiled, giving you the thumbs up.

Your smile returned, and you started to prepare the water for dinner.
13233.title: [Snacking Intensifies]

choices: You both agree that Discretion is the better part of Valor and bail.
You both decide to stand your ground and face what may come.
132331.content:
Dinner was ready in no time, as was the nature of pasta. Especially the kind meant for the cooking impaired where all you had to do was watch a pot of boiling water. While you had planned on just plain Mac and Cheese, your little sister had managed to convince you to add some chopped up hot dogs to it. It helped to clear out the overly full fridge just slightly, so you agreed with a shrug. Two bowls barely made a dent in the huge pots contents, but had already decided not to worry about leftovers yet. For now as both you and Megan retreated to the couch to watch some more TV while you ate, something that you normally never got to do.

"Hey, good call on the hot dogs kiddo." You compliment after a few bites, feet up on the coffee table and bowl in hand.

"Yup!" Megan agrees enthusiastically through a mouthful of noodle, cheese, and hot dog. She was in a similar position as you, though being much shorter she had to sit near the edge of the couch to manage to reach the coffee table with her feet.

Other than some small commentary, you and Megan ate in relative silence. You were busy watching TV, discarding you bowl to the coffee table when you were finished. Your sister, however, was far more engrossed with the cheesy dinner itself. She had finished before you and got herself seconds, finishing that bowl before you were done as well. You didn't really pay it any mind, since that just meant less leftovers to try and cram into the fridge. Or at least, you didn't pay it any mind until around a half hour later.

Your sister plopped down on the couch, giving a petite 'oof' at the action, yet another filled-to-the-top bowl of mac and cheese and a large glass of milk. You shot her a curious glance out of the corner of your eyes. Megan had her feet propped up, balancing her bowl on her swollen middle as she shoveled the cheesy meal down her gullet. She stopped only to take large gulps of milk from her glass and give a satisfied 'whew' before resuming. Her shirt was trying and failing to accommodate her spherical stomach, which seemed to be swelling further with every bite and swig that went down her throat. The sight was ridiculous, almost comically so, with that bloated belly against the small torso and spindly arms of your little sister.

"Jeeze, Meg! What'd you do, eat the whole pot?" You question in shock, tempted to give her stomach a poke to make sure it was real and not some hallucination or joke.

"Huh?" Megan simply stared at you uncomprehendingly, fork in her mouth. After a moment she glanced at the stomach she'd been using as a table, her eyes widening in surprise. Removing the fork, she poked at her taut belly experimentally. The act elicited a small burp, and your sister turned slightly red in surprised embarrassment. She hefted herself into a proper sitting position with a little difficulty, her stuffed stomach resisting her attempts to sit up. "Uh, guess I did? I kind of lost track after fifths."

"You're such a glutton." You sigh with an amused shake of your head.

"Hey! I just like good food okay." She objects. Glancing down at her middle once again, she noticed she hadn't finished off her drink or meal and promptly did so. With a content sigh, she gave up the effort it took to sit upright and sank into the back of the couch. Her shirt finally gave up the ghost as well, riding up the pale sphere of her cheese-filled stomach. "Ok, maybe I'm a little gluttonous."

You both share an amused smile at her concession, before you give her stomach a worried look.

"Doesn't that hurt?" You finally questioned, wondering if you'd end up having to take your sister to the hospital or something.

"Na-urp." Your sister reassured you, patting her stomach at the same time. The action caused her to burp again, interrupting herself on accident. Flushing slightly, you couldn't help but think how adorable she looked. "Actually feeling full for once is sooo great."

"Well... If you say so." You concede with a shrug, deciding that as long as she didn't hurt herself then there wasn't a problem. You turned your attention back to the TV, and this time Megan did so as well.

You both spent the time snarking at the characters and making jokes, such as identifying a bitchy character as 'Lauren!' at the same time for reminding you both of your currently-sulking/plotting sister. Other than being interrupted by the occasional burp as Megan massaged her stuffed tummy. The fun times came to an abrupt end however, as your other sister reemerged from her room upstairs. Not even bothering to glance your direction, Lauren walked past and into the kitchen while declaring:

"I hope you bozo's didn't fill up on junk food, because I'm making dinner!"

You and Megan shot each other worried glances, wondering what horrible concoction the blonde was going to try and demand they eat. You might not have enjoyed the mac and cheese quite as much as Megan had, but it was still delicious and you really didn't want to spoil a good dinner with a bad one. Plus you weren't sure your youngest sister could handle any more food, and you definitely didn't want her hurling an entire pot of mac and cheese over Lauren's terrible cooking.
132331.title: The Cheesening

choices: Megan is in a food coma all night and still asleep when you come downstairs.
Megan finishes off the cake in the night, and is working on breakfast.
1323312.content:
After a series of hushed whispers, you both decided to just tell Lauren you'd already had dinner and she was cooking for one tonight. Something that seemed simpler until you realized that, as the oldest and the one in charge, it was up to you to actually confront her about it. With a weary sigh, you rose from the couch and made your way into the kitchen.

"You idiots used the big soup pot for your junk!" Lauren screeched loudly, making you wince, as she chucked the offending pot into the sink roughly and started filling it with water to scrub it out.

"Er, well it was the only one big enough." You offer as an explanation, causing your sister to whirl around and glare at you. Steeling yourself under the glare, you took a moment to mentally 'man up' before continuing. "Besides, you don't need the big one now since me and Meg already ate."

Lauren's glare turned into something of a squint as she tried to find a way to poke holes in that argument. Instead she simply gave a huff and shut the water off, waving her hand dismissively as she fetched another, smaller pot. You eyed the pot warily, wondering if it was about to be chucked at your head.

"Hmph, you're lucky I'm in a nice, forgiving mood." She explained in a haughty tone, nose upturned. "Since you two dipshits got all this junk, it's better to get it eaten than to let it, as well as mom and dad's money that you spent on it, go to waste. I better not see a single expired package in the trash, got it?"

You relax with a slight sigh at Lauren's decree. Your sister had to feel like she was in the charge, since she was a power tripping ego maniac, but you recognized that she was giving up for now. The key word was for now, though, and you were getting a bit worried about whatever she was going to cook up as revenge. You'd rather she just blow her top and get it over with, really. Not that you'd ever admit it out loud. Besides, her demand of none of it going to waste didn't strike you as likely with the way Megan had already plowed through so much of it on the first day.

So it was that you returned to the couch with Megan to watch more TV and hang out. Explaining Lauren's reaction to Megan had elicited a long roll of her green eyes from the long haired youngster and some cool points in your favor for standing up to her. You may have spun the story slightly to make yourself sound more awesome, but that was to be expected right? In any case, eventually the horrid stench of boiling cabbage wafted into the room from the kitchen, soon followed by Lauren plopping down at the dining room table to eat her 'meal'. You were all more than content to ignore each other, and Lauren eventually retreated back upstairs for the night. Though both you and Megan heard the distinct crinkle of plastic, which meant she was more likely than not smuggling something else up stairs with her. When the sound of her door closing came down the stairs, you both cracked up about it.

"You'd think for someone who bitches about their weight so much, she'd be able to ignore some snacks." Megan mused, hefting herself off the couch with a small grunt of effort.

"Says the eating machine." You tease, shooting a meaningful glance at her stomach.

"Pft! I don't bitch about my weight, so I get to eat whatever I want." She stuck her tongue out at you. Stretching her arms above her head for a moment, she gave a small pat of her stomach. "How about that dessert now?"

"Seriously?" You deadpan, but shrug. "Well, I'm game for a slice. It'll keep Lauren from having an excuse to pitch a fit anyways."

"Hah! Like tubbo needs a reason to pitch a fit." Megan snorts.

You agree with a laugh, and together you head into the kitchen. You had to admit, that cake did look delicious. It was a red velvet cake, with loads of cream cheese frosting heaped on top. Popping the plastic top off, you gave an amused raise of your eyebrow as your sister eagerly held out a plate for you to put a slice on. Even if you were a little concerned with how much Megan was eating today, she also seemed a lot happier than you'd seen her in a long time. Not that she was particularly lacking in pep normally, but it was still nice.

You make the first cut into the smooth, soft cake, but when you go to make the other cut to make it a slice your sister makes a small whining sound. Quirking an eyebrow, you move the knife outward for a wider slice only to get another whine. You move it out again until it was a fourth of the entire cake and she nods happily. Shaking your head at her antics, you finish cutting the slice and heft the thick piece of cake onto her plate. The young teen happily prances off, pausing only to grab a large cup of milk to go with it. You cut yourself a slice and join your sister back on the couch, complete with your own cup of milk, to find she was already digging into her cake.

"Ooooh it's sooooo good!" She moaned, actually taking her time to eat the cake slowly. Though that might just be because she was still pretty full from dinner.

"Mhm." You murmur in agreement, though you clearly weren't quite as into it as Megan was. Still, good cake was good cake and you couldn't recall the last time either of you had a decent cake. Mom had a tendency to try weird, health-cakes for birthdays and the like. None of which ever tasted particularly amazing. Health nut aside, your mom wasn't a particularly good cook. Something else Lauren seemed to have gotten from her.

Despite her stuffed stomach and slower pace, Megan managed to finish her cake and suck down her tall glass of milk before you. Even though she had a far bigger piece and had filled her glass far fuller, and towards the end she started struggling to sit even remotely upright and was breathing heavily. When she was done, she looked like she literally couldn't fit another piece of food in her or she'd pop.

"Ooof... So good." Your stuffed-silly sibling moaned, crumbs, cream cheese and milk dotting her lips as she sagged into the couch and cradled her strained belly. Her breathing was short and ragged as she rubbed circles around the sides of her engorged middle, and you wondered how it was possible for the rest of her organs to fit in there with that stomach. Then again, given how hard it seemed to be for her to breath at the moment, maybe they weren't exactly 'fitting'. "May-hic-be I should h-hic-ave had a smaller pi-hic-ece."

"Looks like it." You comment with amusement, poking a finger against Megan's stomach. The skin didn't yield at all, as hard as a rock from being stretched so tight. Immediately your sister let out a large belch, slapping your hand away with a red face.

"D-Don't do that, Justin!" She chastised, though her pitiful tone made it ineffective and just cute. She attempted to push herself to her feet, but gave up after several petite grunts. Slumping even further into the couch, she gave you a pleading look for help.

"I'll help you this time, but try not to overdo it in the future, got it kiddo?" You state in a mock-stern tone, grabbing your little sister's hands and pulling her to her feet.

"Whoa..." The long haired teen flailed momentarily, trying to keep her balance, before falling back over onto the couch. Helplessly hiccuping for a moment, she looked at you with flushed cheeks. "M-maybe I sh-hic-ould just sleep on the couch."

"I'll fetch some pillows and a blanket." You give her a reassuring smile, ruffling her hair with your hand. Megan flushes brighter, pretty obviously embarrassed. Your youngest sister almost never was embarrassed. Then again, she never stuffed herself so full she couldn't even stand straight. Either way, it was pulling at your 'cute little sister' brotherly instincts pretty hard.

After fetching the aforementioned sleeping supplies from her room, you bid Megan good night and retired upstairs to your own room.

In the Morning...
1323312.title: The Cakening

choices: Declared that hit the spot, content to space out and watch more cartoons.
Complimented you on the sammich, but continued to snack the day away.
13233122.content:
You woke up at the bright and early hour of 11 am and ventured downstairs for a late breakfast to find that, somewhat unexpectedly, Megan was up before you. Not only that, she seemed to have continued her eating spree from the previous day. Your younger sister was currently snuggled up on the couch with the blanket you had given her, cartoons blaring on the tv, with a package of oreos and a tall glass of milk. That would be fairly normal, however, aside from the fact that oreos were never allowed in the house.

Two finished packs of oreos were discarded on the coffee table, along with a emptied box of lucky charms. Yet your sister dipped her oreos in her glass of milk, popped them in her mouth, and swallowed with no effort whatsoever. The overdone dinner and desert of last night had been forgotten, apparently, much to your bewilderment. You would have thought she'd still be too full to eat anything until at least lunch. Well, you were just going to have to wrap your head around how much of a glutton your little sister was when given the chance, you supposed.

"Heya Meg." You greeted as you finished coming down the stairs, stretching and letting out a yawn as you made your way to the kitchen to get something to eat yourself.

"Mornin'." The snacking teen replied, distracted by cartoons and food and somehow managing to reply with her mouth full despite swallowing the oreos whole.

You came to a surprised halt for the second time as you entered the kitchen, blinking blearily at what you saw. Or rather, what you didn't see. The snacks left on the counter had been halved yet again, now a mere fourth of the former pile of junk food that was there merely a day ago. Along with that, you noticed the rest of the cake had vanished as well. Down your little sister's throat, you were certain. With a sigh and a partially amused, partially bewildered shake of your head, you grabbed a bowl and a yet-devoured box of lucky charms.

"Thank god for twinpacks." You muttered to yourself, opening the fridge to fetch the milk. To your surprise, the already opened one from the other day was gone. Thankfully there was another, so you weren't doomed to dry cereal. As you popped the seal off and poured the milk over your cereal, you did a quick search through your memory. You supposed between dinner and dessert, you and meg - mostly meg - had drank quite a lot of milk. Given the evidence on the counter top, you were willing to bet meg had plenty of milk to go with her morning snacks as well.

Snagging a spoon, you turned around and nearly jumped in surprise. Managing not to spill any of your cereal, you blinked as Megan hummed to herself as she looked over the remaining snacks on the counter. Having left her blanket on the couch, you could see that while her stomach was hardly as bloated as when you went to bed, she hadn't wasted any time stuffing as much food into it as she good and getting it back to the pre-dinner pooch you dimly remember being surprised about yesterday. In hindsight, that was definitely nothing when it came to how much food Meg could cram into her gut.

Eventually the long haired teenager settled on a box of twinkies, practically skipping as she left the kitchen once more without paying him any mind. Snapping out of your surprise, you simply put it out of mind and headed back to the couch to settle in for some cartoons with your little sister. You did note, however, as you sat down that she had already started on the box and was popping open her second twinkie. Tossing the wrapper vaguely in the direction of the coffee table, where another lay, she shoved the entire cream-filled spongecake treat in her mouth. Not bothering to chew, she swallowed it whole and pulled another from the box.

Taking a bite of your cereal and enjoying the marshmellowy goodness, you flicked your eyes down to the corner of the box of twinkies. A large yellow '10' left you pretty sure that, at the rate Megan was tearing through them, she'd be fetching yet another snack before you were even done with your cereal. As bewildering as her frenzy of snacking was, she was always a big eater and you couldn't really blame her for going a bit nuts with actually good food in the house for once. She'd probably calm down once she got used to it being in the house, and having a whole three months to enjoy it until mom and dad got back home. With that thought in mind, you let yourself space out and relax as you focused on the absurd antics of the cartoon before you.

Your estimation would proof true, though, as your little sister had in fact finished off the entire box of twinkies before you were done with your cereal. Like yesterday, you simply spaced out as she stuffed herself with treat after treat, routinely getting up to fetch another goodie the moment she was finished with the last. Unlike yesterday, either because she felt like watching tv with you today or because she was too lazy to do so, she didn't retreat upstairs to her room between snacks.

Hours later, your stomach let you know it was getting around time to grab some lunch. Tearing your eyes away from the tv, you pushed yourself to your feet and turned to glance at Megan at the same time. You blinked in surprise at the small pile of discarded wrappers and boxes that swamped the coffee table, your gaze landing on your sister to find her still snuggled up in a blanket and chowing down on a family-sized bag of fritos. Not letting it faze you, you simply gave her a small smile.

"Hey, kiddo, gonna grab a sammich for lunch, want one?" You were mostly offering out of politeness, but you also were fairly sure that Megan wouldn't turn the offer down. At least by making her lunch, she'd get some healthy food in her and not just junk.

"Mhm! 'Anks!" The brown haired girl nodded vigorously, nearly spraying frito-flakes at you with her response.

Suppressing a laugh into merely a amused shake of your head, you headed into the kitchen to prepare the aforementioned 'sammiches'. Hoagie rolls, mustard with just a touch of mayo mixed in, cheddar cheese, slices of roast beef, and some quickly sliced up pickles and tomato. You considered yourself to have rather good taste when it came to making 'sammiches', and had some rather radical opinions about the subject matter. That was why you were adding baby spinach leaves on top instead of lettuce, a subject matter which you and your sister Lauren were vehemently opposed. She, nutjob that she was, was of the opinion that lettuce was the best thing ever instead of a flavor-sucking waste of space.

You blinked, putting those thoughts out of mind. You were a pretty relaxed guy, and you handled eating the health-nut diet enforced on you by your mother and Lauren better than Megan did, but you hated lettuce. With an almost unnatural passion, you admitted. There was some concession to be made for Romaine, though it was still lettuce and still awful. Focusing back on the task at hand, you finished up the pair of 'sammiches'. As you went to put the remaining food away, you paused as a thought came to you.

The one you had made for Megan was reasonably sized, and given you now had a fairly good idea of how much she could eat before she was done, you were pretty sure she was just going to gobble it down and then go right back to binging on junk. You did keep trying to shrug it off, but you were kind of worried about what too much junk food at once would do for her health. So, the way you saw it, you had a choice here. You could give her the sammich as is, a reasonably sized thing exactly the same as the one you had just made for yourself. Or you could load it up into a truly monstrous sammich, one fit for your little sister's black-hole of an appetite. It was all stuff that was good for you, so it'd be fine on that count, and it had a chance of getting her full enough to actually take a break from her constant eating.

You decided that since Megan was determined to overeat either way, you'd at least do your brotherly duty to make sure she ate as well as possible in the process. You added several more layers of everything to one of the sammiches, until it was stacked so high it wouldn't have looked out of place in Scooby-Doo. Not nearly as colossal as some of the cartoonishly huge sammichs Shaggy made, you admitted, but you liked to think it'd have done the fictional scaredy-cat proud. Taking care not to tip it over as you headed back out to the couch with your lunch, you couldn't help but feel like you'd definitely made the right decision when you saw the look on Megan's face.

"Now that's a sammich!" The young teenager coo'd, reaching out in a 'gimme gimme' way, face positively beaming in happiness. Handing it over, she immediately crushed it down as best she could between her slender hands and took a large bite out of it. Somehow, none of it shot out the sides in the process. Swallowing the bite with just as little chewing as she ever did, Megan actually didn't talk with her mouth full for once. "Thankees, Justin!"

"No problemo, kiddo." You gave her a satisfied smirk as you sat down to eat your own, much smaller but no less delicious, sammich.

While you ate your own lunch, you couldn't help but notice that Megan was tearing through her's with gusto. Bite after bite, barely pausing to swallow, the overfilled sammich vanished into her stomach with everything else she'd eaten so far. Licking her lips and fingers before you had even finished your food, as she usually did it seemed, she gave her stomach a contented pat. Even snuggled up under that blanket as she was, you could tell she was pretty stuffed from the almost drumlike thump of her hand against her belly. Stuffed enough to think herself full, you had no idea, but you hoped that was the case.

"Ahhh-urrrp!" Megan let out a happy sigh that was interrupted by a loud and sudden burp, flushing with embarrassment. Patting her stomach a few more times, she then...
13233122.title: The Snackening 2: Second Verse Same As The First

choices: Meanwhile, upstairs in Lauren’s room…
Stick around, it’s about to get interesting…
132331222.content:
“That was the best sammich ever Justin!” Megan chirped. “I think I’m starting to finally feel full again!”

You closed your eyes and nodded as you enjoyed your own sammich at a far more sedate pace than your youngest sister. Megan grunted and from the slight shift in the couch and the soft thump of the blanket, she had managed to get herself off the couch and from the sound of her footfalls was making her way back to the kitchen.

Your eyes snapped opened as you realized what Megan had just said and you looked over your shoulder towards the entryway of the kitchen. Megan had already disappeared around the corner and from the sound of crinkling plastic was looking through the greatly diminished pile of snacks for more to eat.

“You’re still hungry Megan?” you called after your sister, putting your plate and half-finished sammich down on the part of the coffee table that wasn’t littered with wrappers and empty packages. You heard something rattle across the table and you glanced down to see, much to your surprise, what looked like a small pill roll out from an empty box of muffins.

“Well actually, I’m a bit thirsty but I’m getting kinda tired of milk. Can I have one of the sodas, Justin?” Megan asked from inside the kitchen entryway.

“Uh—yeah, sure…” You answered, not really paying attention as you picked up the pill and looked it over. There was no mark on it nor did it look like any of the over-the-counter medicines that were in the upstairs bathroom and… Your eyes narrowed as you brought the pill closer. Was it your imagination or did it look like the pill had crumbs on it?

You looked down at the box it had rolled out of and your eyes widened. It was a box of Hostess Banana-Walnut Mini Muffins. The very same box that Lauren had taken up to her room yesterday afternoon after you and Megan had stood up to her, or rather when Megan had struck a nerve with her choice words. You had thought that she hadn’t been as argumentative as she usually was last night either but…

Could she have given Megan something? Some kind of drug to increase her hunger to beyond what should be humanly possible, a medicine to maximize the capacity of Megan’s stomach to inhuman proportions, or some kind of super-digestive that would inevitably turn Megan’s appetite to more than just food as she continued to swell to literal monstrous proportions?

… Alright, so maybe you’ve been watching a few too many cartoons with Megan lately because you couldn’t see that last one happening. But could you see Lauren using Megan as some kind of guinea pig for one of her “special” diet drugs that she got from whatever new pop-up add caught her attention?

You wanted to think that Lauren wouldn’t do such a thing but having grown up with her, yes you could see her doing exactly that and more besides. Taking the pill firmly in hand, you went upstairs to go and confront her just as Megan came back from the kitchen with a two liter bottle of cola nestled in her skinny arms.

Megan took no notice of your sudden absence, humming happily to herself as she returned to her spot on the couch and fell back with a quiet huff. Smiling gleefully, Megan popped open the bottle of cola with a hiss of released air. She brought the top to her lips, slowly tilted it back, and began to guzzle it down. Megan wondered if she could down the whole thing in a single long chug and, with a delighted grin at her own self-impossed challenge, tilted the bottle up even more.

The drink started to pour so quickly into her belly that Megan could almost swear she could feel it saturating the contents of her stomach, filling every available space within it and causing it to slowly expand further and further outwards. With her head tilted back and her eyes on the prize, Megan had no idea that her stomach really was starting to swell from the soda, ballooning more and more with every gulp of cola.

Had you stuck around a little bit longer you’d have seen that prior to her guzzling, Megan’s stomach was not just as big as it had been the night before. It was far larger in girth. Your youngest sister’s belly was positively bulbous, large as a small beach ball, tight as a drum, and slowly swelling larger with every swallow of soda. Given Megan’s constant snacking for the better part of nearly two days, this in itself wouldn’t be that surprising if it weren’t for one other detail.

For all that she had eaten, there was not an ounce of new fat to be found anywhere. Even Megan’s ballooning belly, which looked positively cartoonish with her legs and arms being stick thin, was only so large from the sheer amount of foodstuffs inside of it. Finishing off the cola, Megan let the bottle fall to the floor with an exhausted gasp. Loosing a quietly pleased sigh, Megan reclined back against the couch with rapturous smile on her face, her tongue flitting out and licking away the faint droplets of soda still coating her lips. However, her smile slowly turned to a confused frown as she became aware of two distinctly strange sensations; a new, and frankly odd, weight that was now resting rather heavily on her thighs and something else she was all too familiar with…

“I’m still not full?” muttered Megan, her hands reaching up to cup her bloated stomach, “How come I don’t…” Her hands came in contact way sooner than she expected, “feel…” Megan looked down at her stomach and her eyes widened as she squeaked, “full?”

Megan stared down at her belly, her jaw hanging in clear disbelief at the sheer size of it. Hesitantly, she pressed a palm against it but the skin didn’t yield at all and the young teenager swallowed nervously. Despite having eaten what had to be her weight in junk food, Megan didn’t feel like she was full at all. Looking over the multitude of empty bags and boxes littering the coffee table and floor, Megan winced and amended her estimation slightly when her eyes caught upon your half finished sammich.

“Food…” Your youngest sister licked her lips, her eyes faintly glazed as she reached down, picked up your sammich, and without a second’s thought stuffed it into her mouth.

Cheeks bulging full, Megan closed her eyes and swallowed the remains of your lunch down with disturbing ease. True, your sammich was hardly a third the size of Megan’s own and already half-eaten by you but even so that was a lot of food to be gulped down by a fourteen year-old girl and it showed. Megan’s face scrunched up as the lump of food moved slowly down her neck and disappeared beneath her collarbone, her chest rising up slightly as it traversed its way down into her belly. Her stomach swelled up just the slightest bit as your sammich landed within its cramped space, trembling slightly with the impact of the sammich’s entry.

Coming back to her senses, Megan gasped for air and looked down towards her gargantuan stomach as it loosed a tremendously loud rumble. So loud in fact that she could swear that her belly actually jiggled from the sheer volume of it. Megan leaned back against the couch, both of her arms cradling her bulging gut, sucking nervously at her lower lip. She stared down at her engorged organ as it now visibly trembled with the force of its grumbling.

That sound, whatever it was, was not one born of hunger. True, Megan didn’t feel at all full like she had just last night, even with the recent addition of your sammich to the stockpile of food and drink already residing within her belly, but she wasn’t feeling hungrier than usual either. Though, to be fair, Megan’s almost constant state of hunger was not entirely on the fault of her mother’s insane dietary meals but another underlying cause. One that in any other time or place, would have led Megan to discover a surprising talent for eating larger-than-average quantities of food. Heck, in another time, in another place, Megan would have found herself a champion of the binge eating circuit of competitions and taken home quite a few prizes alongside her larger-than-life meals.

But that was before Lauren’s small revenge, before a series of tiny pills found their way down Megan’s throat and into her stomach. Now Megan’s body was slowly undergoing a big change, one that would turn her older sister’s little trick, and the young teenaged girl herself, into an enormous disaster for the entirety of the world…
132331222.title: The Guzzling

choices: “GINORMOUS!”
“Shrinking?”
1323312221.content:
As you climbed up the stairs to Lauren’s room, your hand clenched around the pill and you felt yourself getting angrier with every step you took. When you at last arrived to your younger sister’s room, you reacted entirely on instinct by reaching for the doorknob and slamming the door wide open with a shout that died upon seeing the inside of Lauren’s room.

It was messy, crumbs littering all over her desk, some clothes tossed lazily upon her bed, several different pairs of shoes strewn all over the place, but more importantly, no Lauren in sight. Your metaphorical sails sagged at the loss of venting your righteous fury when you blinked with realization. Lauren wasn’t home, meaning that while you couldn’t get any answers straight from her about whatever it was she drugged Megan with, because no doubt you and Megan both with on her cell’s blocked list, you could still search through her room for the evidence.

Pocketing the pill, you took a hesitant step inside Lauren’s room and hastily looked back over your shoulder, almost expecting Lauren to leap out of the bathroom door. You sighed, shaking your head at your imagination and made your way over to Lauren’s crumb littered desk. Aside from the crumbs, which no doubt belonged to the muffins that Lauren had taken to her room last night and now resided in Megan’s stomach along with over half the junk food you had gotten, there was little else in the way of suspicious objects littering its surface.

A squeaky lamp, a box of pens and pencils all with the ends thoroughly gnawed, her personal laptop (which was originally yours but she whined so much about not getting one herself that you agreed to let her borrow it and she hadn’t returned it since), and of course the muffin crumbs. You sat yourself down in front of the desk and checked the drawers. Some notebooks, school textbooks, and –much to your supreme embarrassment— a box of some “personal” toys that you immediately bleached from your mind.

“C’mon, c’mon, there’s got to be something around here…” you muttered to yourself, opening the last drawer to find an empty pill bottle. “Yes!” You looked it over. “Damn!”

There was a tag on it but whatever was written on it had been hastily blacked out with permanent marker. The only real identifying mark on it was the symbol atop the cap, which thankfully didn’t look like any hazardous symbols you recognized but just the same wasn’t one that immediately sprung to your mind a name or a source of these pills. True, it did resemble what looked like a couple of letters stacked on top of each other but beyond that, you hadn’t a clue.

You looked down at Lauren’s laptop before looking back over your shoulder one more time. While you couldn’t hear your youngest sister snacking downstairs you didn’t hear any of the atypical sniping match between Lauren and Megan either. Setting the bottle down beside the laptop, you took a seat in front of Lauren’s desk and tapped a key on the keyboard. You blinked at the sight of the log in screen before rolling your eyes.

Of course Lauren would put a picture of herself as her wallpaper and her log in ID… you thought to yourself. You tapped at the base of the keyboard thinking of a possible password that Lauren might have used when you noticed her background image. It was a picture of herself of course but one that, surprisingly, included you and Megan though one that neither of you cared to see or remember.

It was a picture from last Halloween when you and Megan had been dressed up as Alice and the Mad Hatter respectively. What made the picture, and the memory, a rather horrid one though was the fact that Lauren had dressed, and acted, like the Queen of Hearts the entire time. You looked at the blank password box.

… She wouldn’t really… You typed not a word but four and clicked enter. You groaned as the laptop chirped happily and proceeded to log into Lauren’s desktop. Of course she would…

“All hail queen Lauren my butt…” You muttered before cracking your fingers and leaning forward in the chair. You clicked on the Internet icon and waited for the new screen to load when you suddenly felt something rather strange.

You looked around the room but as quickly as it had arrived, the feeling had passed. Shrugging, you brought up the search history tab and started to scroll through it when you felt it again, this time accompanied by a strange sound. You looked over to the pill bottle and watched as it rattled and shook in place before falling over and rolling to the floor.

You shot to your feet with realization that the house was trembling down to its foundations and, just like before, the trembling disappeared as quickly as it had come. You ran to the nearby window and looked out towards the street. You didn’t see any trucks rolling by and you lived far from anyplace where one would worry about earthquakes so what—?

The house started to tremble again, much more fiercely than before. All the loose items on Lauren’s desk rattled about and you could almost feel your own bones quivering. It was then, that you heard it. A faint moan, coming from downstairs, coming from—

“Megan!”

You hastily raced out of Lauren’s room tripping and stumbling over her littered shoes and colliding with the open doorframe. Brushing aside the mild bit of pain, you made your way along the hallway and down the stairs. You got about halfway down when you spotted your youngest sister.

Megan was lying on her back along the couch, her face flushed red and dripping with sweat. She was panting for breath occasionally loosing a pained moan as she leaned back on the armrest of the couch. Her legs kicked weakly along the cushions, trying and failing to push herself more upright as her sock clad feet failed to gain any traction on the leather. Megan’s hands clawed weakly at the cushions beneath her and top of the couch, sweat-sleaked palms sliding noiselessly as she tried to get comfortable.

Suddenly, Megan gasped, her hands clenching tightly on the cushions as her body started to tremble and shake like the epicenter of an earthquake with the whole of the house swiftly following. Pictures rattled off the walls and furniture, empty and full boxes of food stumbled from their perches to the ground and even you couldn’t help a quick stumble down the stairs, just barely catching yourself on the railing. The source of the rumblings, Megan’s own stomach, was vibrating so hard it seemed almost to blur in place atop the young, pained girl.

“M-Megan!” you called down to your youngest sister. Megan tilted her head back along the arm of the couch to regard you with weak, slightly teary green eyes.
“Ooooh… Ju-Justinnnn…” she groaned, her voice reverberating as her body’s shaking ebbed away into faint tremors. “Mmmm-My st-tom-tommaaaach~ ….”

You head bobbed in a boneless nod as you stared agape at Megan from halfway down the stairs. “I… I see it… Megan… Your stomach… It’s… It’s…!”
1323312221.title: The Searching

choices: She's hungry...
Something else...
13233122212.content:
“Shrinking?” you uttered in confusion. Indeed it was, slowly but surely ebbing back down to Megan’s original slightly chubby middle as the last of her body’s quaking ebbed away.

Megan herself gasped for air, swallowing dryly as she stared down at her now deflated middle. It looked exactly as it always had with a faint trace of chub and the tiniest hint of muscle beneath that. “I… I think it’s stopped…”

“It stopped,” you repeated, “What even happened in the first place?” You quickly walked the rest of the way down the stairs, hopping and stepping over various items that had fallen to the floor.

Megan sat up, speaking frantically. “I-I dunno! My belly, it was, it was so big before and I was still not full and I wanted to eat so I finished your sammich I’m sorry but-but-but then my belly started trembling and it started shrinking and hurting more and more and more until my belly returned to normal but I’m still—” Your sister’s words were starting to blur together as she tried, and failed, to explain what had just happened when she suddenly trailed off. She blinked, looking down at her stomach once more. “I’m…”

“Megan? Megan, are you alright? Are you in pain?”

Megan shook her head, her face slowly starting to flush a deep, rosy red. Her eyes, once dulled and dim from pain, seemed to be shining just a bit brighter as her breathing got heavier. An indescribably good feeling was coursing through Megan, from the soles of her feet to the crown of her head. The pure pleasure of it was building up deep within her, pushing away any thoughts and concerns she had. Megan tugged at the bottom of her shirt, lips parting in a slight smile. “N-No Justin, I… I feel really… good… even though I’m… I’m still…!”

“And you’re what?” you asked, looking Megan over and feeling more than a bit uncomfortable as you noticed how hard her nipples had become, all but piercing the fabric of her shirt, or how she was trying in vain to pull said shirt down to cover a dampening spot between her legs. Before you could say anything, whatever pleasurable feeling that was coursing through Megan suddenly spiked and she fell back to her previous position on the couch with a gasp, her legs stretching out to the opposite armrest.

Literally.

“Oooh… Justin! I… I fe-feel s-soooo~ g-gooood… Bu-But I… I’m still—!” Your eyes widened as your youngest sister started to swell in size. The cuffs of her pants pulling up along her lengthening legs while her socks were pulled past the heels of her feet with her elongating toes tearing their way through the front. Megan lost her grip on the hem of her shirt as it passed her midriff and drew taut over her chest. While her breasts were still their conservative size, Megan’s increasing stature made them far more than what her shirt could contain.

“Mmmm!” Megan’s lips pressed tightly together as she bit back another moan of pleasure and swallowed loudly as a faint lump that were once her braces moved unseen down her throat.

Just as quickly as her growth spurt started, it ended with Megan’s now bare feet dangling over the armrest of the couch. Her head and long locks of brown hair hung over the other side and one arm was sprawled along the floor with the elbow clearly touching the carpet where once Megan would have been incompable of reaching without falling off the couch.

You couldn’t believe it. Your fourteen years-old sister was now seven and a half feet tall.

Slowly coming back to herself, Megan parted her eyes slowly, looking down at her too tight and slightly torn shirt to her form fitting and knee-length sweatpants. Despite the sheer impossibility of her sudden surge in height, Megan was beyond care as she was only partly lucid from what was the closest thing the young teenager had to an orgasmic experience. Such a thing was entirely new to the girl but another, more familiar feeling, was becoming a growing constant for her.

“Hungry…” Megan murmured too quietly for you to hear when you heard something else, a sound that sent a cold chill running down your spine.

Megan’s stomach was rumbling.
13233122212.title: The Enlargening

choices: Critical hit. You crumble.
It wasn’t very effective. To the doctor.
132331222122.content:
Megan sat up sharply, looking down in disbelief at her stomach. To you, it sounded like a hungry growl but to Megan, it was something far, far worse. Though not a speck of food remained in her stomach, Megan’s belly was still bloated with gas and her recent expansion did little to alleviate it. If anything, the gasses trapped within her abdomen were enlarged to greater levels than what her body had undergone with how quickly her stomach had digested several pounds of food.
Her eyes clenched shut as she clapped her hands tightly over her mouth. The pressure, and the rumbling, only swelled in size as tiny tears leaked out the corners of Megan’s eyes from the strain. Realizing she couldn’t hold it in, Megan tilted her head back, dropping her hands away from her face as her mouth opened wide with visible strands of saliva stretched between her now braceless teeth and—

“BBBUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRR{size:4. 5}AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP!!!”

You stumbled back in shock, your hands clasping over your ears as you teenaged sister blasted out the loudest belch you’ve ever heard in your life. The loud, almost demonic burping was perfectly at odds with Megan’s cherubic features, her face twitching and twisting with the gaseous ejection that went on for far longer than should be humanly possible as strange, animal-like noises joined the bassy bellow.

You were surprised that none of the windows in the house had shattered from the sheer force of it. You didn’t doubt for a second that the noise could be heard for several blocks outside the house.

As the last of her gaseous expulsion died away, Megan moaned piteously, hiccupped, and hastily pulled the blanket up. She buried herself beneath it as you tried and failed to get your bearings. It was a ridiculous sight really, to see Megan trying to hide under a blanket that formerly covered her with ease. Now though, her legs and feet stuck out clearly along with most of her brown locks.

“Meg—Meg, c’mon get out from under there.”

“Noooo~!” she whined, curling up into a ball and shaking her head fiercely beneath the blanket. She had managed to get some of her legs under it but her feet were still exposed along with her butt.

“Look we, we need to take you to a doctor or something—”

Megan suddenly sat up, her head popping out from underneath the blanket with wide, terrified eyes and her face still flushed red from embarrassment. “No, Justin! No doctors, please! They—they’ll just think I’m some sort of science experiment! I’m sure that I’m fine now, really! Maybe—Maybe it was some kind of growth spurt?” She looked down at the opposite armrest and grimaced as she wiggled her not-so-little piggies. She gave you a hesitant smile and shrugged, “A super big growth spurt?”

You shook your head, waving at the devastation around you both. Aside from the various items that now littered the floor all about the living room, there was no missing the mountainous piles of empty packages, bags, and assorted wrappings from all manner of junk food. “Look around you Megan! Whatever it was that Lauren gave you it’s obviously done something to your body and—”

“What Lauren gave me?” interrupted Megan. “What do you mean?”

Hastily, you explained what you believed Lauren had done, stressing to your youngest sister that you had no real proof and only your suspicions to go on.

“Lauren drugged me.”

Nonetheless, your sister summarized your assumptions pretty accurately.

“Lauren actually drugged me.” Megan said again, her voice empty and emotionless as before. Her eyes narrowed and she leapt to her feet, the blanket dropping to the floor. Your eyes widened in shock as she held up a fist and started a tirade that would have put any of Lauren’s own to shame were it not for the fact that Megan didn’t know as many curse words as she’d claimed.

Nonetheless, that didn’t stop you from noticing one of the more obvious issues at hand. You coughed and pointedly looked away from your bigger youngest sister. “Megan…”

“And then I’ll kick her right in that bubbly butt of hers, don’t think I won’t Justin, and then I’ll shove my newly enlarged fist right up her—”

“Megan!”

“What, Justin?” Megan turned sharply to look down at you.

Still looking pointedly away from her, and no doubt with a blushing face of your own now, you coughed once more. “Your shirt’s ripped.”

“Huh?” Megan looked down and saw that her angry, hasty motions had lead to the small tears in her shirt to grow into large rips, leaving her chest entirely exposed. “Eeep!” Megan hastily reached down and pulled the blanket up like she was wrapping a towel around herself. Given that the blanket was nearly two feet off the floor, it wasn’t that far off a comparison.

You cleared your throat, still not really looking at your enlarged youngest sister, “Listen, we don’t know for sure if this is because of something that Lauren did but clearly, there is something wrong with you. We need to take you to a doctor Megan.”

“B-But Justin…”

“Go get dressed.” You shook your head, realizing the futility of that idea rather quickly and amended yourself. “You can borrow some of my clothes in the meantime but hurry up. The sooner we get you checked out the sooner this gets fixed.”

Megan didn’t answer. You carefully glanced out the corner of your eye and winced. She was staring down at her feet, shoulders trembling as tears fell from her eyes. She sniffled quietly.
132331222122.title: The Unexpected Eruption

choices: Something strange… The heck is CGX Pharmacuticals…?
Nothing, nada, zilch…
1323312221221.content:
You had to stay strong. You had to. Something was clearly wrong with your youngest sister and you couldn’t let this mess get any worse than it already was. Then, you made the horrible mistake of looking back at your sister once more just in time to see a tear fall down Megan’s face and hit the floor with a tiny plip that, to you, felt like a gunshot to your heart.

“Alright, alright, look, I’ll…” You looked back up the stairs towards Lauren’s room and winced at the many cracked and broken pictures that littered just the staircase alone. “I’m going to try and see if I can’t find something in Lauren’s room to explain… all of this…” You gestured at the evidence of Megan’s binging that littered the coffee table and floor in front of the couch. “If I can’t find anything or Lauren isn’t back soon, then we’re taking you to the doctor? Okay, Megan?”

Megan smiled wetly and nodded, “Okay Justin…” She wiped away the tears with one hand, the other still holding tightly upon the blanket.

“In the meantime…” you sighed and looked around at the mess that was the living room. “Try and clean up down here okay?” You started up the stairs when a thought occurred to you and you looked back at Megan. “And no more food, junk food or otherwise, Megan!”

“Huh?” Megan looked startled at that declaration, almost dropping the blanket and exposing herself to you once more.

“If you eating so much food is what made you grow, then who knows what eating more will do to you? So until we get to the bottom of this, no more food. Alright?”
Megan looked affronted at the very idea but sighed forlornly and nodded, “Alright…”

“Promise?” You pressed, holding up a pinky finger.

Megan sighed again, sounding even more depressed, returning the gesture halfheartedly. “I promise…”

You did an exaggerated I’m-watching-you gesture that got a small giggle out of her before you headed up the stairs and back into Lauren’s room.

Your sister waited until you completely disappeared out of sight before she giggled excitedly and pulled the blanket apart, letting it fall to the floor. She looked and felt herself over, patting and stroking every new inch of flesh to try and find any sign of extra growth elsewhere, specifically around her chest. Finding none, Megan huffed.

“You’d think super big growth spurts means super big boobies too…” she muttered as her hands trailed down to the far more generous swell of her behind. She smiled slightly at the feel of its curvature beneath the tight and torn fabric of her formerly far-too-large sweatpants and gave her generously proportioned glutes a small squeeze. “At least I’ve still got a lot of junk in my trunk.” Megan’s eyes trailed down to the mess that littered the floor and table and sighed. “And plenty more in here too… Did I really eat so much food?”

She walked out of the living and past the stairs that led up to her and Lauren’s rooms and entered your own. Megan hummed softly to herself as she dug through your closest and pulled out the largest hoodie you had along with an equally large pair of sweats and went into the first floor bathroom to change. Discarding her tattered outfit in the nearby trashcan, though still kept her underwear even if her panties had since become more like a thong, Megan put on your borrowed clothes.

Even being a size too big for you, they were clearly a size too small for Megan, the sleeves just barely halfway down her forearms while the cuffs of the pants clung tightly to her calves and the generous swell of her butt. Funnily enough, where the hoodie was lacking in the arm length department, it more than made up for it with a generous girth around the middle, bunching up several times over from where it rested above Megan’s hips and butt.

Turning around and looking herself over in the mirror above the sink, Megan couldn’t help but giggle and smile at the oddity of her reflection. Normally your hand-me-downs were far too big for her to wear and—

Megan blinked and leaned closer to the mirror; opening her mouth wider to make sure she wasn’t seeing things. Her teeth were not only properly positioned but were now also missing the braces that once adorned them.

“So my super big growth spurt gives me perfect teeth but not boobies? Figures…” Megan huffed, blowing a lock of hair out of her eye when she realized something rather important. If her braces weren’t attached to her teeth anymore… then where were they? Megan hastily walked back into the living room and batted aside empty bags on the floor before moving on to the couch. Even removing the cushions, Megan couldn’t find anything but some loose change.

Trying to think back on her growth spurt, and blushing slightly at the memory of the pleasurable feeling that had coursed through her right before it started, Megan’s eyes opened wide with realization.

“I swallowed them?!” she yelped, hands shooting down to her stomach. She lifted up the sweatshirt and pawed at her belly to try and feel her braces beneath her skin. Realizing how silly she was being, Megan shook her head, laughing uneasily. “No way that’s… that’s impossible…”

As impossible as it is to eat your weight in food in less than two days, have your stomach put a beach ball to shame, and, oh yes, have said stomach disappear followed shortly by an enormous growth spurt? A voice that suspiciously sounded a lot like Lauren’s snidely whispered its way into Megan’s thoughts. Wow, your brain’s as flat as your chest isn’t it?

Megan frowned and pulled the sweatshirt back over her stomach, looking down at the mess of wrappers, bags, and assorted empty boxes. Much as she wanted to shut that inner voice up by proving it wrong, Justin had made her promise not to eat any more food. True, while Megan rather liked the feeling that preceded her growth spurt, and the growth itself, she didn’t like the pain her belly had underwent before that. Besides, it wasn’t like she could chew up bits of plastic and cardboard or that they would even taste that good…

Taste smaste, like you even give a crap about that. Remember the twinkies? You swallowed them whole, stupid. All you care about is stuffing your belly so why don’t you do as Justin asked and clean up all this junk? Into the trash can or into your belly, what’s the difference really?

Megan swallowed heavily and shook her head, doing her best to ignore that nagging little voice in her head or the way that her mouth was watering at the idea of eating again. She reached down and picked up the empty box that once contained mini-muffins, fully intending to toss it into the trash. Regardless of how her perpetually hungry tummy was starting to feel frighteningly famished, she wouldn’t eat any more junk food, just like she promised.

But actual junk isn’t food now is it?

Megan’s stomach uttered another whining gurgle. She looked at the box in her hand and licked her lips.

1323312221221.title: Megan Used Real Tears! It’s Super Effective!

choices: Megan still cleaning up the living room, looking rather disgruntled…
A spotless living room and a suspiciously chipper Megan…
13233122212211.content:
Having spent what felt like hours looking through Lauren’s purloined laptop, you were at your wits end. Dozens of Youtube videos, weight loss websites, and far more instagram posts than you ever cared to see featuring your oldest younger sister. Nothing at all that pointed to where Lauren had gotten the pills from or what they were supposed to do. Tiredly massaging your eyes, you reached over to shut the laptop when you paused. The last page had finally finished loading and you saw a very familiar looking symbol adorning the top of the website.

You hastily picked up the pill bottle from the floor, looking back and forth between the symbol that adorned its top to the matching one on the website. “CGX Pharmacuticals…”

You scrolled down the page and hastily read through every page that it had, which unfortunately wasn’t much. From what you could gather, it was an up and coming medical company that was actually based right in your hometown and specialized in medicinal applications concerning weight loss and…

“Total caloric distribution…?” You muttered to yourself, leaning forward to read the page better but, unfortunately, the medical jargon only got worse the more you read. There was a series gifs of a young woman, younger than your mom but definitely no teenager. The first gif showed the woman taking one of the pills and then going to town with a meal fit for twelve people at least. The second had her looking forlornly at a rather promiment potbelly that, while certainly big, still paled in comparison to what Megan’s had looked like early. In fact, the only reason it was noticeable at all was that the earlier gif showed that she was skinny as a twig. The gif then showed her standing tall and proud with not an ounce of chub in sight and…You blinked. Was it your imagination or did the woman’s clothes look a size too small for her?

Eventually, you reached the bottom of the page where you saw an invite for anyone willing to sign up and apply to be a part of their clinical trials.

You sat back in the chair in disbelief. Bad enough that Lauren decided to secretly feed Megan some pills but the crazy bitch actually gave her untested drugs? Oh you did not care how much trouble you got into with your parents when they came back, you were going to sock Lauren straight in the face the moment you saw her.

With that firm resolution in mind, you scoured the sight for any way to contact them but there was no email or phone number listed and the email you found that confirmed their shipment of the trial drugs was an automated one too. All that you could find was an address and one quick search through GoogleMaps got you a location. Surprisingly, it wasn’t that far from the local mall, literally a few blocks away in fact and in one of the very same business office building that your father worked at too.

Hopefully, Megan wouldn’t argue with you about taking her to this CGX place to try and find a cure for whatever their test drug was doing to her. They weren’t technically doctors and really given her overall change in stature, you didn’t doubt for one moment that Megan wouldn’t put up a hell of a fight if they tried anything.

Not to say that you wouldn’t either but given Megan had more than a foot in height over you…

With that plan in mind you headed down the stairs, feeling like it had been hours when really it was hardly thirty minutes. You looked around the living room and saw…
13233122212211.title: The Cause of the Effect

choices: “Here you go Megan. These should fit.”
“Here you go Meg—What the heck are you doing…?!”
132331222122112.content:
You couldn’t help but loose a quiet, appreciative whistle. In direct contrast to how it looked before you went up to Lauren’s room, the living room was now completely and utterly free of all the trash from Megan’s binging. The girl herself was now sitting on the couch, remote in hand watching cartoons like she hadn’t just undergone an impossible eating binge followed shortly by an equally impossible growth spurt.

In fact, Megan actually looked a bit too happy right now. She never liked doing chores no matter who tasked her with them and dealing with trash was one she hated doing the most. True, she was watching one of her favorite cartoons after some serious hard work, but to look so happy? You thought back to CGX’s website and the gifs of that woman. Was Megan’s elation part of the pill’s side-effects or was your littlest—er, youngest sister actually beginning to enjoy her new stature?

You shook your head at that thought, brushing it away and calling down to your sister, “Megan, I think I’ve got something!”

Megan looked up at you, slightly startled as she hastily muted the TV and moved her other hand away from the top of her stomach. “Jeez, Justin! Don’t scare me like that!”

“Sorry,” you apologized, “but I think I’ve got an idea about the pills Lauren gave you…” You quickly told Megan what you had found and throughout it all she listened attentively though you couldn’t help but notice the way that her hands strayed to her stomach, messing around with the excessive folds of her borrowed hoodie. She must be getting hungry but thankfully, she had kept true to her word and hadn’t eaten any more food or so you hoped. You took a quick glance into the kitchen and saw that the pile of snacks had remained untouched and that even the empty boxes and wrappers in there had been tossed away.

“So wait…” Megan tilted her head, looking only slightly up at you as even sitting on the couch, she was only barely shorter than you. “The pills are supposed to distribute calories? To where? I mean,” She looked down at herself, her hands patting her chest. “I got bigger yeah but no where in particular…”

You blushed slightly at that and coughed into your hand. “Regardless of what the pills are supposed to do, they clearly are doing far more than advertised. We need to bring you over to them and see if they don’t have anything that can fix this.”

Megan chewed her lip thoughtfully for a moment as you mentally prepared yourself for another adamant, and possibly tearful, refusal when she nodded. “Okay.”

“Now Megan, I understand that you might be scared but—” You blinked. “Wait, what?”

“I said okay.” She shrugged, “It’s in the same office building dad works in right? I’ve snuck around in there so many times I probably know it better than the actual security guards do! If these guys aren’t on the up and up, I can just run away!”

That… wasn’t exactly likely but you weren’t about to look a gift horse in the mouth. You nodded. “Alright, go and get your shoes on and we’ll head over there.”
“Um… Justin?” Megan pointed down at her bare feet, which easily rested halfway across the coffee table, her not-so-little toes wiggling for further emphasis. You palmed your face.

“Right, right… I think I’ve got a pair of sandals that should do for now… I’ll be right back.”

“Got it!” Megan chirped, giving you a salute that you returned with a smile. Once you disappeared down the hallway and into your room, Megan loosed a quiet sigh and looked down at her belly. She reached down and pulled up the hoodie, revealing that her stomach had swollen in size once more, still somehow smooth and round despite the amount of cardboard and hard plastic resting within it. With her enlarged stature, Megan’s stomach didn’t look quite as inflated as it would have if she were her normal height, but even so there was a definite roundness to it that could not be missed when out in the open like it was.

Megan gave her belly a gentle pat and hiccupped, a piece of a chip bag popping out of her mouth and floating through the air. She hastily snatched it and quickly swallowed it back down, looking around for you before loosing a relieved breath. The young brunette turned off the television and started to set down the remote beside her before stopping and giving it a familiar look. She glanced back over her shoulder in the direction of your room before she brought the remote up to her salivating mouth.
132331222122112.title: Suspiciously Chipper...

choices: The car groaned loudly. "No good, you're too heavy Megan!"
The car handles the weight, but can Megan handle the wait?
Reader's Choice
1323312221221121.content:
Megan knew she should be feeling disgusted with herself, utterly nauseated at the idea of eating something that clearly wasn’t food. She knew it and had tried so hard to feel it whilst she was “cleaning up” the living room but those feelings never came. Only the delightful satisfaction that resulted whenever something filled the void that was her belly, pushing it ever outward with every swallow.

An actual feeling of fullness never came to mind beyond a bittersweet memory and an embarrassed giggle. The remarkably amazing feeling that had come prior and during her growth spurt never seemed to stray too far from the forefront of her thoughts. The memory alone dusting Megan’s cheeks pink and a pleasant tingle down her spine at the merest recollection. Young as she is, Megan had unknowingly come quite close to her first orgasm, literally moments away from it though she had no idea then or now.

All that Megan knew was that it had been an experience that she wanted to feel once more no matter the consequences. A result of years of being left unsatisfied, never truly knowing what itmeant to be full but for one lone instant.

Ever since she was a child, Megan had an appetite that had never been sated. Her spree yesterday had been the closest she had ever felt to fulness and even that was a short-lived feeling come this morning. With a mother whose idea of an impressive meal consisted mostly of greens and other less-than-tasty choices of food, Megan often imagined entire cakes, buckets of fried chicken, and other assorted food-stuffs as she swallowed down her third helping of broccoli and felt all the emptier for it. It was such a common routine for Megan that it was practically by instinct that she started imagining as she “cleaned up” after herself.

Except… it wasn’t food she was imagining in place of the litter…
